data.text: It isn't friendly, whatever it is. Come on, Chewie, let's check  it out.

data.author: Rieekan
data.text: Send Rouges Ten and Eleven to station three-eight.

data.author: Han
data.text: Afraid there's not much left.

data.author: Leia
data.text: What was it?

data.author: Han
data.text: Droid of some kind. I didn't hit it that hard. It  must have had a self-destruct.

data.author: Leia
data.text: An Imperial probe droid.

data.author: Han
data.text: It's a good bet the Empire knows we're here.

data.author: Rieekan
data.text: We'd better start the evacuation.

data.author: Piett
data.text: Admiral.

data.author: Ozzel
data.text: Yes, Captain

data.author: Piett
data.text: I think we've got something, sir. The report is only a fragment  had.

data.author: Ozzel
data.text: We have thousands of probe droids searching the  galaxy. I want proof, not leads!

data.author: Piett
data.text: The visuals indicate life readings.

data.author: Ozzel
data.text: It could mean anything. If we followed every lead...

data.author: Piett
data.text: But, sir, the Hoth system is supposed to be devoid of human  forms.

data.author: Vader
data.text: You found something?

data.author: Piett
data.text: Yes, my lord.

data.author: Vader
data.text: That's it. The  Rebels are there.

data.author: Ozzel
data.text: My lord, there are so many uncharted settlements. It could be  smugglers, it could be...

data.author: Vader
data.text: That is the system. And I'm sure Skywalker is with them. Set  your course for the Hoth system. General Veers, prepare you men.

data.author: Rebel Captain
data.text: Groups seven and ten will stay behind to fly the  speeders. As soon as each transport is loaded, evacuation control will give clearance for immediate launch.

data.author: Rebel Fighter
data.text: Right, sir.

data.author: Han
data.text: Okay, that's it. Try it...Off! Turn it  off! Turn it off! Off!

data.author: Medical Droid
data.text: Sir, it will take quite awhile to evacuate the T-forty-  sevens.

data.author: Luke
data.text: Well, forget the heavy equipment. There's plenty of time to get  the smaller modules on the transports.

data.author: Medical Droid
data.text: Take care, sir.

data.author: Luke
data.text: Thanks.

data.author: Luke
data.text: Chewie, take care of yourself, okay?

data.author: Han
data.text: Hi, kid.  There's got to be a reason for it. Check it  at the other end. Wait a second.  You all right?

data.author: Luke
data.text: Yeah.

data.author: Han
data.text: Be careful.

data.author: Luke
data.text: You, too.

data.author: Controller
data.text: General, there's a fleet of Star Destroyers coming out of  hyperspace in sector four.

data.author: Rieekan
data.text: Reroute all power to the energy shield. We've got to hold  them till all transports are away. Prepare for ground assault.

data.author: Vader
data.text: What is it, General?

data.author: Veers
data.text: My lord, the fleet has moves out of light-speed. Com-Scan has  detected an energy field protecting an area around the sixth planet of the Hoth system. The field is strong enough to deflect any bombardment.

data.author: Vader
data.text: The Rebels are alerted to our presence. Admiral Ozzel  came out of light-speed too close to the system.

data.author: Veers
data.text: He felt surprise was wiser...

data.author: Vader
data.text: He is as clumsy as he is stupid. General, prepare your troops  for a surface attack.

data.author: Veers
data.text: Yes, my lord.

data.author: Ozzel
data.text: Lord Vader, the fleet has moved out of light-speed, and we're  preparing to...Aaagh!

data.author: Vader
data.text: You have failed me for the last time, Admiral. Captain Piett.

data.author: Piett
data.text: Yes, my lord.

data.author: Vader
data.text: Make ready to land out troops beyond the energy shield and  deploy the fleet so that nothing gets off that system. You are in command now, Admiral Piett.

data.author: Piett
data.text: Thank you, Lord Vader.

data.author: Leia
data.text: All troop carriers will assemble at the north entrance. The  heavy transport ships will leave as soon as they're loaded. Only two fighter escorts per ship. The energy shield can only be opened for a short time, so you'll have to stay very close to your transports.

data.author: Hobbie
data.text: Two fighters against a Star Destroyer?

data.author: Leia
data.text: The ion cannon will fire several shots to make sure that any  enemy ships will be out of your flight path. When you've gotten past the energy shield, proceed directly to the rendezvous point. Understood?

data.author: Pilots
data.text: Right. Okay.

data.author: Leia
data.text: Good luck.

data.author: Derlin
data.text: Okay. Everyone to your stations. Let's go!

data.author: Rieekan
data.text: Their primary target will be the power generators. Prepare to  open the shield.

data.author: Controller
data.text: Sir, Rebel ships are coming into our sector.

data.author: Captain
data.text: Good. Our first catch of the day.

data.author: Woman Controller
data.text: Stand by, ion control....Fire!

data.author: Announcer
data.text: The first transport is away.

data.author: Dack
data.text: Feeling all right, sir?

data.author: Luke
data.text: Just like new, Dack. How about you?

data.author: Dack
data.text: Right now I feel I could take on the whole Empire myself.

data.author: Luke
data.text: I know what you mean.

data.author: Trench Officer
data.text: Echo Station Three-T-Eight.

data.author: Trench Officer
data.text: We have spotted Imperial walkers!

data.author: Controller
data.text: Imperial walkers on the north ridge.

data.author: Luke
data.text: Echo station Five-Seven. We're on our way.

data.author: Luke
data.text: All right, boys, keep tight now.

data.author: Dack
data.text: Luke, I have no approach vector. I'm not set.

data.author: Luke
data.text: Steady, Dack. Attack pattern delta. Go now!

data.author: Luke
data.text: All right, I'm coming in.

data.author: Luke
data.text: Hobbie, you still with me?

data.author: Luke
data.text: That armor's too strong for blasters.

data.author: Luke
data.text: Rouge Group, use your harpoons and tow cables. Go  for the legs. It might be our only chance of stopping them.  All right, stand by, Dack.

data.author: Dack
data.text: Luke, we've got a malfunction in fire control. I'll have to cut  in the auxiliary.

data.author: Luke
data.text: Just hang on. Hang on, Dack. Get ready to fire that tow cable.

data.author: Luke
data.text: Dack? Dack!

data.author: Veers
data.text: Yes, Lord Vader. I've reached the main power generator. The  shield will be down in moments. You may start your landing.

data.author: Luke
data.text: Rouge Three.

data.author: Wedge
data.text: Copy, Rouge Leader

data.author: Luke
data.text: Wedge, I've lost my gunner. You'll have to make  this shot. I'll cover for you. Set your harpoon. Follow me on the next pass.

data.author: Wedge
data.text: Coming around, Rouge Leader.

data.author: Luke
data.text: Steady, Rouge Two

data.author: Wedge
data.text: Activate harpoon.

data.author: Wedge
data.text: Good shot, Janson.

data.author: Wedge
data.text: One more pass.

data.author: Janson
data.text: Coming around. Once more.

data.author: Janson
data.text: One more.

data.author: Janson
data.text: Cable out! Let her go!

data.author: Wedge
data.text: Detach cable.

data.author: Janson
data.text: Cable detached.

data.author: Trench Officer
data.text: Come on!

data.author: Wedge
data.text: Whooha!! That got him!

data.author: Luke
data.text: I see it, Wedge. Good work.

data.author: Rieekan
data.text: I don't think we can protect two transports at a time.

data.author: Leia
data.text: It's risky, but we can't hold out much longer. We have no  choice.

data.author: Rieekan
data.text: Launch patrols.

data.author: Leia
data.text: Evacuate remaining ground staff.

data.author: Han
data.text: No, no! No! This one goes there, that one goes there. right?

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Artoo, you take good care of Master Luke now, understand?  And...do take care of yourself. Oh, dear, oh, dear.

data.author: Veers
data.text: All troops will debark for ground assault. Prepare to target  the main generator.

data.author: Luke
data.text: Rouge Two, are you all right?

data.author: Zev
data.text: Yeah. I'm with you, Rouge Leader.

data.author: Luke
data.text: We'll set harpoon. I'll cover for you.

data.author: Zev
data.text: Coming around.

data.author: Luke
data.text: Watch that cross fire, boys.

data.author: Zev
data.text: Set for position three.  Steady.

data.author: Luke
data.text: Stay tight and low.

data.author: Luke
data.text: Hobbie, I've been hit!

data.author: Han
data.text: You all right?

data.author: Leia
data.text: Why are you still here?

data.author: Han
data.text: I heard the command center had been hit.

data.author: Leia
data.text: You got your clearance to leave.

data.author: Han
data.text: Don't worry. I'll leave. First I'm going to get you to your ship.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Your Highness, we must take this last transport. It's our  only hope.

data.author: Leia
data.text: Send all troops in sector twelve to the south  slope to protect the fighters.

data.author: Announcer
data.text: Imperial troops have entered the base.

data.author: Han
data.text: Come on...that's it.

data.author: Leia
data.text: Give the evacuation code signal. And get to  your transports!

data.author: Head Controller
data.text: K-one-zero...all troops disengage.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Oh! Wait for me!

data.author: Officer
data.text: Begin retreat!

data.author: Second Officer
data.text: Fall back!

data.author: Veers
data.text: Distance to power generators?

data.author: Pilot
data.text: One-seven, decimal two-eight.

data.author: Veers
data.text: Target. Maximum fire power.

data.author: Han
data.text: Transport, this is Solo. Better take off -- I  can't get to you. I'll get the princess out on the Falcon.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: But...but...but...where are you going? Uh...come back!!

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Wait! Wait for me! Wait! Stop!

data.author: Threepio
data.text: How typical.

data.author: Han
data.text: Come on.

data.author: Han
data.text: Hurry up, goldenrod, or you're going to be a permanent resident!

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Wait! Wait!

data.author: Han
data.text: How's this?

data.author: Leia
data.text: Would it helped if I got out and pushed?

data.author: Han
data.text: It might.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Captain Solo, Captain Solo...sir, might I suggest that  you...

data.author: Threepio
data.text: It can wait.

data.author: Leia
data.text: The bucket of bolts is never going to get us past that blockade.

data.author: Han
data.text: This baby's got a few surprises left in her, sweetheart.

data.author: Han
data.text: Come on! Come on! Switch over. Let's hope we don't have a  burnout.

data.author: Han
data.text: See?

data.author: Leia
data.text: Someday you're going to be wrong, and I hope I'm there to see it.

data.author: Han
data.text: Punch it!

data.author: Luke
data.text: Artoo! Get her ready for takeoff.

data.author: Wedge
data.text: Good luck, Luke. See you at the rendezvous.

data.author: Luke
data.text: Don't worry, Artoo. We're going, we're going.

data.author: Luke
data.text: There's nothing wrong, Artoo. I'm just setting a  new course.

data.author: Luke
data.text: We're not going to regroup with the others.

data.author: Luke
data.text: We're going to the Dagobah system.

data.author: Luke
data.text: Yes, Artoo?

data.author: Luke
data.text: That's all right. I'd like to keep it  on manual control for a while.

data.author: Han
data.text: I saw them! I saw them!

data.author: Leia
data.text: Saw what?

data.author: Han
data.text: Star Destroyers, two of them, coming right at us.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Sir, sir! Might I suggest...

data.author: Han
data.text: Shut him up or shut him down!  Check the  deflector shield!

data.author: Han
data.text: Oh, great. Well, we can still outmaneuver them.

data.author: Imperial Officer
data.text: Take evasive action!

data.author: Han
data.text: Prepare to make the jump to light-speed.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: But, sir!

data.author: Leia
data.text: They're getting closer!

data.author: Han
data.text: Oh yeah? Watch this.

data.author: Leia
data.text: Watch what?

data.author: Han
data.text: I think we're in trouble.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: If I may say so, sir, I noticed earlier the hyperdrive  motivator has been damaged. It's impossible to go to light-speed!

data.author: Han
data.text: We're in trouble!

data.author: Han
data.text: Horizontal boosters...!

data.author: Han
data.text: Alluvial dampers...! Well that's not it.

data.author: Han
data.text: Bring me the hydrospanners!

data.author: Han
data.text: I don't know how we're going to get out of this one.

data.author: Han
data.text: Oww! Chewie!

data.author: Han
data.text: That was no laser blast! Something hit us.

data.author: Leia
data.text: Han, get up here!

data.author: Han
data.text: Come on, Chewie!

data.author: Leia
data.text: Asteroids!

data.author: Han
data.text: Oh, no! Chewie, set two-seven-one.

data.author: Leia
data.text: What are you doing? You're not actually going into an asteroid  field?

data.author: Han
data.text: They'd be crazy to follow us, wouldn't they?

data.author: Leia
data.text: You don't have to do this to impress me.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Sir, the possibility of successfully navigating an asteroid  field is approximately three thousand, seven hundred and twenty to one.

data.author: Han
data.text: Never tell me the odds!

data.author: Han
data.text: You said you wanted to be around when I made a mistake

data.author: Leia
data.text: I take it back. We're going to get pulverized if we stay out  here much longer.

data.author: Han
data.text: I'm not going to argue with that.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Pulverized?

data.author: Han
data.text: I'm going in closer to one of the big ones.

data.author: Leia
data.text: Closer?

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Closer?!

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Oh, this is suicide!

data.author: Han
data.text: There. That looks pretty good.

data.author: Leia
data.text: What looks pretty good?

data.author: Han
data.text: Yeah. That'll do nicely.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Excuse me, ma'am, but where are we going?

data.author: Leia
data.text: I hope you know what you're doing.

data.author: Han
data.text: Yeah, me too.

data.author: Luke
data.text: Yes, that's it. Dagobah.

data.author: Luke
data.text: No, I'm not going to change my mind about this.   I'm not picking up any cities or technology. Massive life-form readings, though. There's something alive down there...

data.author: Luke
data.text: Yes, I'm sure it's perfectly safe for droids.

data.author: Luke
data.text: I know, I know! All the scopes are dead. I can't  see a thing! Just hang on, I'm going to start the landing cycle...

data.author: Luke
data.text: No, Artoo, you stay put. I'll have a look around.

data.author: Luke
data.text: Artoo?

data.author: Luke
data.text: Artoo! Where are you?

data.author: Luke
data.text: Artoo! You be more careful.

data.author: Luke
data.text: Artoo -- that way!

data.author: Luke
data.text: Artoo!

data.author: Luke
data.text: Oh, no! Are you all right? Come on. You're lucky you don't taste  very good. Anything broken?

data.author: Luke
data.text: If you're saying coming here was a bad idea, I'm beginning to  agree with you. Oh, Artoo, what are we doing here? It's like... something out of a dream, or, I don't know. Maybe I'm just going crazy.

data.author: Vader
data.text: Yes, Admiral?

data.author: Piett
data.text: Our ships have sighted the Millennium Falcon, lord. But...it  has entered an asteroid field and we cannot risk...

data.author: Vader
data.text: Asteroids do not concern me, Admiral. I want  that ship and not excuses.

data.author: Piett
data.text: Yes, lord.

data.author: Han
data.text: I'm going to shut down everything but the emergency power  systems.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Sir, I'm almost afraid to ask, but...does that include  shutting me down, too?

data.author: Han
data.text: No, I need you to talk to the Falcon, find out what's wrong with  the hyperdrive.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Sir, it's quite possible this asteroid is not entirely  stable.

data.author: Han
data.text: Not entirely stable? I'm glad you're here to tell us these  things.  Chewie, take the professor in the back and plug him into the hyperdrive.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Oh! Sometimes I just don't understand human behavior. After  all, I'm only trying to do my job in the most...

data.author: Leia
data.text: Let go.

data.author: Han
data.text: Sshh!

data.author: Leia
data.text: Let go, please.

data.author: Han
data.text: Don't get excited.

data.author: Leia
data.text: Captain, being held by you isn't quite enough to get me excited.

data.author: Han
data.text: Sorry, sweetheart. We haven't got time for anything else.

data.author: Luke
data.text: Ready for some power? Okay. Let's see now. Put that in there.  There you go.

data.author: Luke
data.text: Now all I have to do is find this Yoda...if he even  exists.

data.author: Luke
data.text: Still...there's something familiar about this place. I feel  like...I don't know...

data.author: Strange Voice
data.text: Feel like what?

data.author: Luke
data.text: Like we're being watched!

data.author: Creature
data.text: Away with your weapon! I mean you no harm.

data.author: Creature
data.text: I am wondering, why are you here?

data.author: Luke
data.text: I'm looking for someone.

data.author: Creature
data.text: Looking? Found someone, you have, I would say, hmmm?

data.author: Luke
data.text: Right.

data.author: Creature
data.text: Help you I can. Yes, mmmm.

data.author: Luke
data.text: I don't think so. I'm looking for a great warrior.

data.author: Creature
data.text: Ahhh! A great warrior.  Wars not  make one great.

data.author: Luke
data.text: Put that down. Hey! That's my dinner.

data.author: Creature
data.text: How you get so big, eating food of this kind?

data.author: Luke
data.text: Listen, friend, we didn't mean to land in that puddle, and if we  could get our ship out, we would, but we can't, so why don't you just...

data.author: Creature
data.text: Aww, cannot get your ship out?

data.author: Luke
data.text: Hey, you could have broken this. Don't do that. Ohhh...you're  making a mess. Hey, give me that!

data.author: Creature
data.text: Mine! Or I will help you not.

data.author: Luke
data.text: I don't want your help. I want my lamp back. I'll need it to get  out of this slimy mudhole.

data.author: Creature
data.text: Mudhole? Slimy? My home this is.

data.author: Creature
data.text: Ah, ah, ah!

data.author: Luke
data.text: Oh, Artoo, let him have it.

data.author: Creature
data.text: Mine! Mine!

data.author: Luke
data.text: Artoo!

data.author: Creature
data.text: Mine!

data.author: Creature
data.text: Mine!

data.author: Luke
data.text: Now will you move along, little fella? We're got a lot  of work to do.

data.author: Creature
data.text: No! No, no! Stay and help you, I will.  Find your  friend, hmm?

data.author: Luke
data.text: I'm not looking for a friend, I'm looking for a Jedi Master.

data.author: Creature
data.text: Oohhh. Jedi Master. Yoda. You seek Yoda.

data.author: Luke
data.text: You know him?

data.author: Creature
data.text: Mmm. Take you to him, I will.  Yes, yes. But now, we  must eat. Come. Good food. Come.

data.author: Creature
data.text: Come, come.

data.author: Luke
data.text: Stay here and watch after the camp, Artoo.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Oh, where is Artoo when I need him?

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Sir, I don't know where your ship learned to communicate,  but it has the most peculiar dialect. I believe, sir, it says that the power coupling on the negative axis has been polarized. I'm afraid you'll have to replace it.

data.author: Han
data.text: Well, of course I'll have to replace it.

data.author: Han
data.text: Here! And Chewie...

data.author: Han
data.text: ...I think we'd better replace the negative power  coupling.

data.author: Han
data.text: Hey, Your Worship, I'm only trying to help.

data.author: Leia
data.text: Would you please stop calling me that?

data.author: Han
data.text: Sure, Leia.

data.author: Leia
data.text: Oh, you make it so difficult sometimes.

data.author: Han
data.text: I do, I really do. You could be a little nicer, though.  Come on, admit it. Sometimes you think I'm all right.

data.author: Leia
data.text: Occasionally  maybe...when you aren't  acting like a scoundrel.

data.author: Han
data.text: Scoundrel? Scoundrel? I like the sound of that.

data.author: Leia
data.text: Stop that.

data.author: Han
data.text: Stop what?

data.author: Leia
data.text: Stop that! My hands are dirty.

data.author: Han
data.text: My hands are dirty, too. What are you afraid of?

data.author: Leia
data.text: Afraid?

data.author: Han
data.text: You're trembling.

data.author: Leia
data.text: I'm not trembling.

data.author: Han
data.text: You like me because I'm a scoundrel. There aren't enough  scoundrels in your life.

data.author: Leia
data.text: I happen to like nice men.

data.author: Han
data.text: I'm a nice man.

data.author: Leia
data.text: No, you're not. You're...

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Sir, sir! I've isolated the reverse power flux coupling.

data.author: Han
data.text: Thank you. Thank you very much.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Oh, you're perfectly welcome, sir.

data.author: Needa
data.text: ...and that, Lord Vader, was the last time they  appeared in any of our scopes. Considering the amount of damage we've sustained, they must have been destroyed.

data.author: Vader
data.text: No, Captain, they're alive. I want every ship available to  sweep the asteroid field until they are found.

data.author: Piett
data.text: Lord Vader.

data.author: Vader
data.text: Yes, Admiral, what is it?

data.author: Piett
data.text: The Emperor commands you make contact with him.

data.author: Vader
data.text: Move the ship out of the asteroid field so that we can send a  clear transmission.

data.author: Piett
data.text: Yes, my lord.

data.author: Vader
data.text: What is thy bidding, my master?

data.author: Emperor
data.text: There is a great disturbance in the Force.

data.author: Vader
data.text: I have felt it.

data.author: Emperor
data.text: We have a new enemy -- Luke Skywalker.

data.author: Vader
data.text: Yes, my master.

data.author: Emperor
data.text: He could destroy us.

data.author: Vader
data.text: He's just a boy. Obi-Wan can no longer help him.

data.author: Emperor
data.text: The Force is strong with him. The son of Skywalker must not  become a Jedi.

data.author: Vader
data.text: If he could be turned, he would become a powerful ally.

data.author: Emperor
data.text: Yes. Yes. He would be a great asset. Can it be done?

data.author: Vader
data.text: He will join us or die, my master.

data.author: Luke
data.text: Look, I'm sure it's delicious. I just don't understand why we  can't see Yoda now.

data.author: Creature
data.text: Patience! For the Jedi it is time to eat as well. Eat, eat.  Hot. Good food, hm? Good, hmm?

data.author: Luke
data.text: How far away is Yoda? Will it take us long to get there?

data.author: Creature
data.text: Not far. Yoda not far. Patience. Soon you will be with him.   Rootleaf, I cook. Why wish you become Jedi? Hm?

data.author: Luke
data.text: Mostly because of my father, I guess.

data.author: Creature
data.text: Ah, your father. Powerful Jedi was he, powerful Jedi, mmm.

data.author: Luke
data.text: Oh, come on. How could you know my father? You  don't even know who I am.  Oh, I don't even know what I'm doing here. We're wasting our time.

data.author: Creature
data.text: I cannot teach him. The boy has no patience.

data.author: Ben
data.text: He will learn patience.

data.author: Yoda
data.text: Hmmm. Much anger in him, like his father.

data.author: Ben
data.text: Was I any different when you taught me?

data.author: Yoda
data.text: Hah. He is not ready.

data.author: Luke
data.text: Yoda! I am ready. I...Ben! I can be a Jedi. Ben, tell him I'm  ready.

data.author: Yoda
data.text: Ready, are you? What know you of ready? For eight hundred years  have I trained Jedi. My own counsel will I keep on who is to be trained! A Jedi must have the deepest commitment, the most serious mind.  This one a long time have I watched. Never his mind on where he was. Hmm? What he was doing. Hmph. Adventure. Heh! Excitement. Heh! A Jedi craves not these things.  You are reckless!

data.author: Ben
data.text: So was I, if you'll remember.

data.author: Yoda
data.text: He is too old. Yes, too old to begin the training.

data.author: Luke
data.text: But I've learned so much.

data.author: Yoda
data.text: Will he finished what he begins?

data.author: Luke
data.text: I won't fail you -- I'm not afraid.

data.author: Yoda
data.text: Oh, you will be. You will be.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Sir, if I may venture an opinion...

data.author: Han
data.text: I'm not really interested in your opinion, Threepio.

data.author: Leia
data.text: There's something out there.

data.author: Han
data.text: Where?

data.author: Leia
data.text: Outside, in the cave.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: There it is. Listen! Listen!

data.author: Han
data.text: I'm going out there.

data.author: Leia
data.text: Are you crazy?!

data.author: Han
data.text: I just got this bucket back together. I'm not going to let  something tear it apart.

data.author: Leia
data.text: Then I'm going with you.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: I think it might be better if I stay here and guard the  ship.  Oh, no.

data.author: Leia
data.text: This ground sure feels strange. It doesn't feel like rock at  all.

data.author: Han
data.text: There's an awful lot of moisture in here.

data.author: Leia
data.text: I don't know. I have a bad feeling about this.

data.author: Han
data.text: Yeah.

data.author: Han
data.text: Watch out!

data.author: Han
data.text: Yeah, that's what I thought. Mynock. Chewie, check the rest of  the ship, make sure there aren't any more attached. They're chewing on the power cables.

data.author: Leia
data.text: Mynocks?

data.author: Han
data.text: Go on inside. We'll clean them off if there are any more.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Ohhh! Go away! Go away! Beastly thing. Shoo! Shoo!

data.author: Han
data.text: Wait a minute...

data.author: Han
data.text: All right, Chewie, let's get out of here!

data.author: Leia
data.text: The Empire is still out there. I don't think it's wise to...

data.author: Han
data.text: No time to discuss this as a committee.

data.author: Leia
data.text: I am not a committee!

data.author: Leia
data.text: You can't make the jump to light-speed in this asteroid field...

data.author: Han
data.text: Sit down, sweetheart. We're taking off!

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Look!

data.author: Han
data.text: I see it, I see it.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: We're doomed!

data.author: Leia
data.text: The cave is collapsing.

data.author: Han
data.text: This is no cave.

data.author: Leia
data.text: What?

data.author: Yoda
data.text: Run! Yes. A Jedi's strength flows from the Force. But beware of  the dark side. Anger...fear...aggression. The dark side of the Force are they. Easily they flow, quick to join you in a fight. If once you start down the dark path, forever will it dominate your destiny, consume you it will, as it did Obi-Wan's apprentice.

data.author: Luke
data.text: Vader. Is the dark side stronger?

data.author: Yoda
data.text: No...no...no. Quicker, easier, more seductive.

data.author: Luke
data.text: But how am I to know the good side from the bad?

data.author: Yoda
data.text: You will know. When you are calm, at peace. Passive. A Jedi uses  the Force for knowledge and defense, never for attack.

data.author: Luke
data.text: But tell me why I can't...

data.author: Yoda
data.text: No, no, there is no why. Nothing more will I  teach you today. Clear your mind of questions. Mmm. Mmmmmm.

data.author: Luke
data.text: There's something not right here.

data.author: Luke
data.text: I feel cold, death.

data.author: Yoda
data.text: That place...is strong with the dark side of the Force. A domain  of evil it is. In you must go.

data.author: Luke
data.text: What's in there?

data.author: Yoda
data.text: Only what you take with you.

data.author: Yoda
data.text: Your weapons...you will not need them.

data.author: Piett
data.text: Bounty hunters. We don't need that scum.

data.author: First Controller
data.text: Yes, sir.

data.author: Piett
data.text: Those Rebels won't escape us.

data.author: Second Controller
data.text: Sir, we have a priority signal from the Star  Destroyer Avenger.

data.author: Piett
data.text: Right.

data.author: Vader
data.text: ...there will be a substantial reward for the one who finds  the Millennium Falcon. You are free to use any methods necessary, but I want them alive. No disintegrations.

data.author: Boba Fett
data.text: As you wish.

data.author: Piett
data.text: Lord Vader! My lord, we have them.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Oh, thank goodness we're coming out of the asteroid field.

data.author: Han
data.text: Let's get out of here. Ready for light-speed? One...two...three!

data.author: Han
data.text: It's not fair!

data.author: Han
data.text: The transfer circuits are working. It's not my fault!

data.author: Leia
data.text: No light-speed?

data.author: Han
data.text: It's not my fault.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Sir, we just lost the main rear deflector shield. One more  direct hit on the back quarter and we're done for.

data.author: Han
data.text: Turn her around.

data.author: Han
data.text: I said turn her around! I'm going to put all power in the front  shield.

data.author: Leia
data.text: You're going to attack them?!

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Sir, the odds of surviving a direct assault on an Imperial  Star Destroyer...

data.author: Leia
data.text: Shut up!

data.author: Needa
data.text: They're moving to attack position. Shields up!

data.author: Needa
data.text: Track them,. They may come around for another pass.

data.author: Tracking Officer
data.text: Captain Needa, the ship no longer appears on our  scopes.

data.author: Needa
data.text: They can't have disappeared. No ship that small has a cloaking  device.

data.author: Tracking Officer
data.text: Well, there's no trace of them, sir.

data.author: Communications Officer
data.text: Captain, Lord Vader demands an update on the  pursuit.

data.author: Needa
data.text: Get a shuttle ready. I shall assume full  responsibility for losing them, and apologize to Lord Vader. Meanwhile, continue to scan the area.

data.author: Communications Officer
data.text: Yes, Captain Needa.

data.author: Yoda
data.text: Use the Force. Yes...

data.author: Yoda
data.text: Now...the stone. Feel it.

data.author: Yoda
data.text: Concentrate!

data.author: Luke
data.text: Oh, no. We'll never get it out now.

data.author: Yoda
data.text: So certain are you. Always with you it cannot be done. Hear you  nothing that I say?

data.author: Luke
data.text: Master, moving stones around is one thing. This is totally  different.

data.author: Yoda
data.text: No! No different! Only different in your mind. You must unlearn  what you have learned.

data.author: Luke
data.text: All right, I'll give it a try.

data.author: Yoda
data.text: No! Try not. Do. Or do not. There is no try.

data.author: Luke
data.text: I can't. It's too big.

data.author: Yoda
data.text: Size matters not. Look at me. Judge me by my size, do you? Hm?  Mmmm.

data.author: Yoda
data.text: And well you should not. For my ally in the Force. And a  powerful ally it is. Life creates it, makes it grow. It's energy surrounds us and binds us. Luminous beings are we......not this crude matter.  You must feel the Force around you.  Here, between you...me...the tree...the rock...everywhere! Yes, even between this land and that ship!

data.author: Luke
data.text: You want the impossible.

data.author: Luke
data.text: I don't...I don't believe it.

data.author: Yoda
data.text: That is why you fail.

data.author: Vader
data.text: Apology accepted, Captain Needa.

data.author: Piett
data.text: Lord Vader, our ships have completed their scan of the area and  found nothing. If the Millennium Falcon went into light-speed, it'll be on the other side of the galaxy by now.

data.author: Vader
data.text: Alert all commands. Calculate every possible destination along  their last know trajectory.

data.author: Piett
data.text: Yes, my lord. We'll find them.

data.author: Vader
data.text: Don't fail me again, Admiral.

data.author: Piett
data.text: Alert all commands. Deploy the fleet.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Captain Solo, this time you have gone too far.  No, I will not be quiet, Chewbacca. Why doesn't anyone listen to me?

data.author: Han
data.text: The fleet is beginning to break up. Go back and stand  by the manual release for the landing claw.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: I really don't see how thats going to help. Surrender is a  perfectly acceptable alternative in extreme circumstances. The Empire may be gracious enough...

data.author: Han
data.text: Thank you.

data.author: Leia
data.text: What did you have in mind for your next move?

data.author: Han
data.text: Well, if they follow standard Imperial procedure, they'll dump  their garbage before they go to light-speed, then we just float away.

data.author: Leia
data.text: With the rest of the garbage. Then what?

data.author: Han
data.text: Then we've got to find a safe port somewhere around here. Got any  ideas?

data.author: Leia
data.text: No. Where are we?

data.author: Han
data.text: The Anoat system.

data.author: Leia
data.text: Anoat system. There's not much there.

data.author: Han
data.text: No. Well, wait. This is interesting. Lando.

data.author: Leia
data.text: Lando system?

data.author: Han
data.text: Lando's not a system, he's a man. Lando Calrissian. He's a card  player, gambler, scoundrel. You'd like him.

data.author: Leia
data.text: Thanks.

data.author: Han
data.text: Bespin. It's pretty far, but I think we can make it.

data.author: Leia
data.text: A mining colony?

data.author: Han
data.text: Yeah, a Tibanna gas mine. Lando conned somebody out of it. We go  back a long way, Lando and me.

data.author: Leia
data.text: Can you trust him?

data.author: Han
data.text: No. But he has no love for the Empire, I can tell you that.

data.author: Han
data.text: Here we go, Chewie. Stand by. Detach!

data.author: Leia
data.text: You do have your moments. Not many, but you have them.

data.author: Yoda
data.text: Concentrate...feel the Force flow. Yes. Good. Calm, yes. Through  the Force, things you will see. Other places. The future...the past. Old friends long gone.

data.author: Luke
data.text: Han! Leia!

data.author: Yoda
data.text: Hmm. Control, control. You must learn control.

data.author: Luke
data.text: I saw...I saw a city in the clouds.

data.author: Yoda
data.text: Mmm. Friends you have there.

data.author: Luke
data.text: They were in pain.

data.author: Yoda
data.text: It is the future you see.

data.author: Luke
data.text: Future? Will they die?

data.author: Yoda
data.text: Difficult to see. Always in motion is the future.

data.author: Luke
data.text: I've got to go to them.

data.author: Yoda
data.text: Decide you must how to serve them best. If you leave now, help  them you could. But you would destroy all for which they have fought and suffered.

data.author: Han
data.text: No, I don't have a landing permit. I'm trying  to reach Lando Calrissian.

data.author: Han
data.text: Whoa! Wait a minute! Let me explain.

data.author: Intercom Voice
data.text: You will not deviate from your present course.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Rather touchy, aren't they?

data.author: Leia
data.text: I thought you knew this person.

data.author: Han
data.text: Well, that was a long time ago. I'm sure he's  forgotten about that.

data.author: Intercom Voice
data.text: Permission granted to land on Platform  Three-two-seven.

data.author: Han
data.text: Thank you.

data.author: Han
data.text: There's nothing to worry about. We go way back, Lando and me.

data.author: Leia
data.text: Who's worried?

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Oh. No one to meet us.

data.author: Leia
data.text: I don't like this.

data.author: Han
data.text: Well, what would you like?

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Well, they did let us land.

data.author: Han
data.text: Look, don't worry. Everything's going to be fine. Trust me.

data.author: Han
data.text: See? My friend.  Keep your eyes open, okay?

data.author: Lando
data.text: Why, you slimy, double-crossing, no-good swindler! You've got a  lot of guts coming here, after what you pulled.

data.author: Lando
data.text: How you doing, you old pirate? So good to see you! I  never thought I'd catch up with you again. Where you been?

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Well, he seems very friendly.

data.author: Leia
data.text: Yes...very friendly.

data.author: Lando
data.text: What are you doing here?

data.author: Han
data.text: Ahh...repairs. I thought you could  help me out.

data.author: Lando
data.text: What have you done to my ship?

data.author: Han
data.text: Your ship? Hey, remember, you lost her to me fair and square.

data.author: Lando
data.text: Hello. What have we here? Welcome. I'm Lando Calrissian. I'm  the administrator of this facility. and who might you be?

data.author: Leia
data.text: Leia.

data.author: Lando
data.text: Welcome, Leia.

data.author: Han
data.text: All right, all right, you old smoothie.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Hello, sir. I am See-Threepio, human-cyborg relations. My  facilities are at your...

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Well, really!

data.author: Lando
data.text: What's wrong with the Falcon?

data.author: Han
data.text: Hyperdrive.

data.author: Lando
data.text: I'll get my people to work on it.

data.author: Han
data.text: Good.

data.author: Lando
data.text: You know, that ship saved my life quite a few times. She's the  fastest hunk of junk in the galaxy.

data.author: Han
data.text: How's the gas mine? Is it paying off for you?

data.author: Lando
data.text: Oh, not as well as I'd like. We're a small outpost and not very  self-sufficient. And I've had supply problems of every kind. I've had labor difficulties... What's so funny?

data.author: Han
data.text: You. Listen to you -- you sound like a businessman, a responsible  leader. Who'd have thought that, huh?

data.author: Lando
data.text: You know, seeing you sure brings back a few things.

data.author: Han
data.text: Yeah.

data.author: Lando
data.text: Yeah, I'm responsible these days. It's the  price you pay for being successful.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Oh! Nice to see a familiar face.

data.author: Second Threepio
data.text: E chu ta!

data.author: Threepio
data.text: How rude!

data.author: Threepio
data.text: That sounds like an R2 unit in there. I wonder if...

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Hello? How interesting. Oh, my.

data.author: Man
data.text: Who are you?

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Oh, I'm terribly sorry. I...I didn't mean to intrude. No,  no, please don't get up. No!

data.author: Yoda
data.text: Luke! You must complete the training.

data.author: Luke
data.text: I can't keep the vision out of my head. They're my friends. I've  got to help them.

data.author: Yoda
data.text: You must not go!

data.author: Luke
data.text: But Han and Leia will die if I don't.

data.author: Ben
data.text: You don't know that.

data.author: Ben
data.text: Even Yoda cannot see their fate.

data.author: Luke
data.text: But I can help them! I feel the Force!

data.author: Ben
data.text: But you cannot control it. This is a dangerous time for you, when  you will be tempted by the dark side of the Force.

data.author: Yoda
data.text: Yes, yes. To Obi-Wan you listen. The cave. Remember your failure  at the cave!

data.author: Luke
data.text: But I've learned so much since then. Master Yoda, I promise to  return and finish what I've begun. You have my word.

data.author: Ben
data.text: It is you and your abilities the Emperor wants. that is why your  friends are made to suffer.

data.author: Luke
data.text: And that is why I have to go.

data.author: Ben
data.text: Luke, I don't want to lose you to the Emperor the way I lost  Vader.

data.author: Luke
data.text: You won't.

data.author: Yoda
data.text: Stopped they must be. On this depends. Only a fully trained Jedi  Knight with the Force as his ally will conquer Vader and his Emperor. If you end your training now, if you choose the quick and easy path, as Vader did, you will become an agent of evil.

data.author: Ben
data.text: Patience.

data.author: Luke
data.text: And sacrifice Han and Leia?

data.author: Yoda
data.text: If you honor what they fight for...yes!

data.author: Ben
data.text: If you choose to face Vader, you will do it alone. I cannot  interfere.

data.author: Luke
data.text: I understand.  Artoo, fire up the  converters.

data.author: Ben
data.text: Luke, don't give in to hate -- that leads to the dark side.

data.author: Yoda
data.text: Strong is Vader. Mind what you have learned. Save you it can.

data.author: Luke
data.text: I will. And I'll return. I promise.

data.author: Yoda
data.text: Told you, I did. Reckless is he. Now matters are worse.

data.author: Ben
data.text: That boy is our last hope.

data.author: Yoda
data.text: No. There is another.

data.author: Han
data.text: The ship is almost finished. Two or Three more things and we're  in great shape.

data.author: Leia
data.text: The sooner the better. Something's wrong here. No one has seen  or knows anything about Threepio. He's been gone too long to have gotten lost.

data.author: Han
data.text: Relax. I'll talk to Lando and see what I can find out.

data.author: Leia
data.text: I don't trust Lando.

data.author: Han
data.text: Well, I don't trust him, either. But he is my friend. Besides,  we'll soon be gone.

data.author: Leia
data.text: And then you're as good as gone, aren't you?

data.author: Leia
data.text: What happened?

data.author: Han
data.text: Where? Found him in a junk pile?

data.author: Leia
data.text: Oh, what a mess. Chewie, do you think you can repair him?

data.author: Han
data.text: Lando's got people who can fix him.

data.author: Leia
data.text: No, thanks.

data.author: Lando
data.text: I'm sorry. Am I interrupting anything?

data.author: Leia
data.text: Not really.

data.author: Lando
data.text: You look absolutely beautiful. You truly belong here with us  among the clouds.

data.author: Leia
data.text: Thank you.

data.author: Lando
data.text: Will you join me for a little refreshment?

data.author: Lando
data.text: Everyone's invited, of course.

data.author: Lando
data.text: Having trouble with you droid?

data.author: Han
data.text: No. No problem. Why?

data.author: Lando
data.text: So you see, since we're a small operation, we don't fall into  the...uh...jurisdiction of the Empire.

data.author: Leia
data.text: So you're part of the mining guild then?

data.author: Lando
data.text: No, not actually. Our operation is small enough not to be  noticed...which is advantageous for everybody since our customers are anxious to avoid attracting attention to themselves.

data.author: Han
data.text: Aren't you afraid the Empire's going to find out about this  little operation and shut you down?

data.author: Lando
data.text: That's always been a danger looming like a shadow over  everything we've built here. But things have developed that will insure security. I've just made a deal that will keep the Empire out of here forever.

data.author: Vader
data.text: We would be honored if you would join us.

data.author: Lando
data.text: I had no choice. They arrived right before you did. I'm sorry.

data.author: Han
data.text: I'm sorry, too.

data.author: Luke
data.text: No, Threepio's with them.

data.author: Luke
data.text: Just hang on. We're almost there.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Mmmm. Oh, my. Uh, I, uh -- Take this off! I, uh, don't mean  to intrude here. I, don't, no, no, no...Please don't get up. No!

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Stormtroopers? Here? We're in danger. I must tell the  others. Oh, no! I've been shot!

data.author: Lando
data.text: Lord Vader.

data.author: Vader
data.text: You may take Captain Solo to Jabba the Hut after I  have Skywalker.

data.author: Boba Fett
data.text: He's no good to me dead.

data.author: Vader
data.text: He will not be permanently damaged.

data.author: Lando
data.text: Lord Vader, what about Leia and the Wookiee?

data.author: Vader
data.text: They must never again leave this city.

data.author: Lando
data.text: That was never a condition of our agreement, nor was giving Han  to this bounty hunter!

data.author: Vader
data.text: Perhaps you think you're being treated unfairly.

data.author: Lando
data.text: No.

data.author: Vader
data.text: Good. It would be unfortunate if I had to leave a garrison  here.

data.author: Lando
data.text: This deal's getting worse all the time.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Oh, yes, that's very good. I like that. Oh! Something's not  right because now I can't see. Wait. Wait! Oh, my! what have you done? I'm backwards, you stupid furball. Only an overgrown mophead like you would be stupid enough...

data.author: Han
data.text: I feel terrible.

data.author: Leia
data.text: Why are they doing this?

data.author: Han
data.text: They never even asked me any questions.

data.author: Leia
data.text: Lando.

data.author: Han
data.text: Get out of here, Lando!

data.author: Lando
data.text: Shut up and listen! Vader has agreed to turn Leia and Chewie  over to me.

data.author: Han
data.text: Over to you?

data.author: Lando
data.text: They'll have to stay here, but at least they'll be safe.

data.author: Leia
data.text: What about Han?

data.author: Lando
data.text: Vader's giving him to the bounty hunter.

data.author: Leia
data.text: Vader wants us all dead.

data.author: Lando
data.text: He doesn't want you at all. He's after somebody called  Skywalker.

data.author: Han
data.text: Luke?

data.author: Lando
data.text: Lord Vader has set a trap for him.

data.author: Leia
data.text: And we're the bait.

data.author: Lando
data.text: Well, he's on his way.

data.author: Han
data.text: Perfect. You fixed us all pretty good, didn't you?   My friend!

data.author: Lando
data.text: Stop! I've done all I can do. I'm sorry I couldn't do better,  but I have my own problems.

data.author: Han
data.text: Yeah, you're a real hero.

data.author: Leia
data.text: You certainly have a way with people.

data.author: Vader
data.text: This facility is crude, but it should be adequate to freeze  Skywalker for his journey to the Emperor.

data.author: Imperial Soldier
data.text: Lord Vader, ship approaching. X-wing class.

data.author: Vader
data.text: Good. Monitor Skywalker and allow him to land.

data.author: Lando
data.text: Lord Vader, we only use this facility for carbon freezing. If  you put him in there, it might kill him.

data.author: Vader
data.text: I do not want the Emperor's prize damaged. We will test it...on  Captain Solo.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: If only you had attached my legs, I wouldn't be in this  ridiculous position. Now, remember, Chewbacca, you have a responsibility to me, so don't do anything foolish.

data.author: Han
data.text: What's going on...buddy?

data.author: Lando
data.text: You're being put into carbon freeze.

data.author: Boba Fett
data.text: What if he doesn't survive? He's worth a lot to me.

data.author: Vader
data.text: The Empire will compensate you if he dies. Put him in!

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Oh, no! No, no, no! Stop, Chewbacca, stop...!

data.author: Han
data.text: Stop, Chewie, stop! Do you hear me? Stop!

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Yes, stop, please! I'm not ready to die.

data.author: Han
data.text: Chewie! Chewie, this won't help me. Hey!

data.author: Han
data.text: Save your strength. There'll be another time. The princess -- you  have to take care of her. You hear me?

data.author: Leia
data.text: I love you!

data.author: Han
data.text: I know.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: What...what's going on? Turn around, Chewbacca, I can't see.  Oh...they've encased him in carbonite. He should be quite well-protected -- if he survives the freezing process, that is.

data.author: Vader
data.text: Well, Calrissian, did he survive?

data.author: Lando
data.text: Yes, he's alive. And in perfect hibernation.

data.author: Vader
data.text: He's all yours bounty hunter. Reset the chamber for Skywalker.

data.author: Imperial Officer
data.text: Skywalker has just landed, my lord.

data.author: Vader
data.text: Good. See to it that he finds his way here. Calrissian, take  the princess and the Wookiee to my ship.

data.author: Lando
data.text: You said they'd be left in the city under my supervision.

data.author: Vader
data.text: I am altering the deal. Pray I don't alter it any further.

data.author: Leia
data.text: Luke! Luke, don't -- it's a trap! It's a trap!

data.author: Vader
data.text: The Force is with you, young Skywalker. But you are not a Jedi  yet.

data.author: Lando
data.text: Well done. Hold them in the security tower -- and keep it  quiet. Move.

data.author: Leia
data.text: What do you think you're doing?

data.author: Lando
data.text: We're getting out of here.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: I knew all along it had to be a mistake.

data.author: Leia
data.text: Do you think that after what you did to Han we're going to trust  you?

data.author: Lando
data.text: I had no choice...

data.author: Threepio
data.text: What are you doing? Trust him, trust him!

data.author: Leia
data.text: Oh, so we understand, don't we, Chewie? He had no choice.

data.author: Lando
data.text: I'm just trying to help...

data.author: Leia
data.text: We don't need any of your help.

data.author: Lando
data.text: H-a-a-a...

data.author: Leia
data.text: What?

data.author: Threepio
data.text: It sounds like Han.

data.author: Lando
data.text: There's still a chance to save Han...I mean, at the East  Platform...

data.author: Leia
data.text: Chewie.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: I'm terribly sorry about all this. After all,  he's only a Wookiee.

data.author: Boba Fett
data.text: Put Captain Solo in the cargo hold.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Artoo! Artoo! Where have you been?

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Turn around, you wooly...!  Hurry, hurry! We're  trying to save Han from the bounty hunter!

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Well, at least your still in one piece! Look what happened  to me!

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Oh, no! Chewie, they're behind you!

data.author: Vader
data.text: You have learned much, young one.

data.author: Luke
data.text: You'll find I'm full of surprises.

data.author: Vader
data.text: Your destiny lies with me, Skywalker. Obi-Wan knew this to be  true.

data.author: Luke
data.text: No!

data.author: Vader
data.text: All to easy. Perhaps you are not as strong as the Emperor  thought.

data.author: Vader
data.text: Impressive...most impressive.

data.author: Vader
data.text: Obi-Wan has taught you well. You have controlled your fear...  now release your anger.

data.author: Vader
data.text: Only your hatred can destroy me.

data.author: Lando
data.text: The security codes has been changed!

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Artoo, you can tell the computer to override the security  system.

data.author: Lando
data.text: Attention! This is Lando Calrissian. The Empire has takes  control of the city. I advise everyone to leave before more Imperial troops arrive.

data.author: Lando
data.text: This way.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Don't blame me. I'm an interpreter. I'm not supposed to know  a power socket from a computer terminal.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: What are you talking about? We're not interested in the  hyperdrive on the Millennium Falcon. It's fixed! Just open the door, you stupid lump.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: I never doubted you for a second. Wonderful!

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Ouch! Oh! Ah! That hurt, Bend down, you thoughtless...Ow!

data.author: Lando
data.text: Leia! Go!

data.author: Threepio
data.text: I thought that hairy beast would be the end of me. Of  course, I've looked better.

data.author: Vader
data.text: You are beaten. It is useless to resist. Don't let yourself be  destroyed as Obi-Wan did.

data.author: Vader
data.text: There is no escape. Don't make me destroy you. You do not yet  realize your importance. You have only begun to discover you power. Join me and I will complete your training. With our combined strength, we can end this destructive conflict and bring order to the galaxy.

data.author: Luke
data.text: I'll never join you!

data.author: Vader
data.text: If you only knew the power of the dark side. Obi-Wan never told  you what happened to your father.

data.author: Luke
data.text: He told me enough! He told me you killed him.

data.author: Vader
data.text: No. I am your father.

data.author: Luke
data.text: No. No. That's not true! That's impossible!

data.author: Vader
data.text: Search your feelings. You know it to be true.

data.author: Luke
data.text: No! No! No!

data.author: Vader
data.text: Luke. You can destroy the Emperor. He has foreseen this. It is  your destiny. Join me, and we can rule the galaxy as father and son. Come with me. It's the only way.

data.author: Luke
data.text: Ben...Ben, please!

data.author: Luke
data.text: Ben. Leia!

data.author: Luke
data.text: Hear me! Leia!

data.author: Leia
data.text: Luke...We've got to go back.

data.author: Lando
data.text: What?

data.author: Leia
data.text: I know where Luke is.

data.author: Lando
data.text: But what about those fighter?

data.author: Leia
data.text: Chewie, just do it.

data.author: Lando
data.text: But what about Vader?

data.author: Lando
data.text: All right, all right, all right.

data.author: Vader
data.text: Bring my shuttle.

data.author: Lando
data.text: Look, someone's up there.

data.author: Leia
data.text: It's Luke. Chewie, slow down. Slow down and we'll get under him.  Lando, open the top hatch.

data.author: Leia
data.text: Okay. Easy, Chewie.

data.author: Leia
data.text: Lando?

data.author: Lando
data.text: Okay, let's go.

data.author: Luke
data.text: Oh, Leia.

data.author: Lando
data.text: All right, Chewie. Let's go.

data.author: Leia
data.text: I'll be back.

data.author: Leia
data.text: Star Destroyer.

data.author: Lando
data.text: All right, Chewie. Ready for light-speed.

data.author: Leia
data.text: If your people fixed the hyperdrive.

data.author: Leia
data.text: All the coordinates are set. It's now or never.

data.author: Lando
data.text: Punch it!

data.author: Lando
data.text: They told me they fixed it. I trusted them to fix it. It's not  my fault!

data.author: Piett
data.text: They'll be in range of our tractor beam in moments, lord.

data.author: Vader
data.text: Did your men deactivate the hyperdrive on the Millennium  Falcon?

data.author: Piett
data.text: Yes, my lord.

data.author: Vader
data.text: Good. Prepare the boarding party and set for your weapons for  stun.

data.author: Piett
data.text: Yes, my lord.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Noisy brute. Why don't we just go into light-speed?

data.author: Threepio
data.text: We can't? How would you know the hyperdrive is deactivated?

data.author: Threepio
data.text: The city's central computer told you? Artoo-Detoo, you know  better than to trust a strange computer. Ouch! Pay attention to what you're doing!

data.author: Vader
data.text: Luke.

data.author: Luke
data.text: Father.

data.author: Vader
data.text: Son, come with me.

data.author: Luke
data.text: Ben, why didn't you tell me?

data.author: Lando
data.text: Chewie!

data.author: Luke
data.text: It's Vader.

data.author: Vader
data.text: Luke...it is your destiny.

data.author: Luke
data.text: Ben, why didn't you tell me?

data.author: Piett
data.text: Alert all commands. Ready for the tractor beam.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Artoo, come back at once! You haven't finished with me yet!  You don't know how to fix the hyperdrive. Chewbacca can do it. I'm standing here in pieces, and you're having delusions of grandeur!

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Oh, you did it!

data.author: Lando
data.text: Luke, we're ready for takeoff.

data.author: Luke
data.text: Good luck, Lando

data.author: Lando
data.text: When we find Jabba the Hut and that bounty  hunter, we'll contact you.

data.author: Luke
data.text: I'll meet you at the rendezvous point on  Tatooine.

data.author: Lando
data.text: Princess, we'll find Han. I promise.

data.author: Luke
data.text: Chewie, I'll be waiting for your signal.

data.author: Luke
data.text: Take care, you two. May the Force be with you.

data.author: Luke
data.text: Ow!

data.author: Shuttle Captain
data.text: Command station, this is ST 321. Code Clearance Blue. We're starting our approach. Deactivate the security shield.

data.author: Death star Controller
data.text: The security deflector shield will be deactivated when we have confirmation of your code transmission. Stand by... You are clear to proceed.

data.author: Shuttle Captain
data.text: We're starting our approach.

data.author: Officer
data.text: Inform the commander that Lord Vader's shuttle has arrived.

data.author: Operator
data.text: Yes, sir.

data.author: Jerjerrod
data.text: Lord Vader, this is an unexpected pleasure.  We're honored by your presence.

data.author: Vader
data.text: You may dispense with the pleasantries, Commander. I'm here to put you back on schedule.

data.author: Jerjerrod
data.text: I assure you, Lord Vader, my men are working as fast as they can.

data.author: Vader
data.text: Perhaps I can find new ways to motivate them.

data.author: Jerjerrod
data.text: I tell you, this station will be operational as planned.

data.author: Vader
data.text: The Emperor does not share your optimistic appraisal of the situation.

data.author: Jerjerrod
data.text: But he asks the impossible. I need more men.

data.author: Vader
data.text: Then perhaps you can tell him when he arrives.

data.author: Jerjerrod
data.text: The Emperor's coming here?

data.author: Vader
data.text: That is correct, Commander. And he is most displeased with your apparent lack of progress.

data.author: Jerjerrod
data.text: We shall double our efforts.

data.author: Vader
data.text: I hope so, Commander, for your sake. The Emperor is not as forgiving as I am.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Of course I'm worried. And you should be, too. Lando Calrissian and poor Chewbacca never returned from this awful place.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Don't be so sure. If I told you half the things I've heard about this Jabba the Hutt, You'd probably short-circuit.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Artoo, are you sure this is the right place? I better knock, I suppose.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: There doesn't seem to be anyone there. Let's go back and tell Master Luke.

data.author: Strange Voice
data.text: Tee chuta hhat yudd!

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Goodness gracious me!

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Artoo Detoowha bo Seethreepiowha ey toota odd mischka Jabba du Hutt.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: I don't think they're going to let us in, Artoo. We'd better go.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Artoo, wait. Oh, dear! Artoo. Artoo, I really don't think we should rush into all this.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Oh, Artoo!  Artoo, wait for me!

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Just you deliver Master Luke's message and get us out of here. Oh my! Oh! Oh, no.

data.author: Bib
data.text: Die Wanna Wanga!

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Oh, my! Die Wanna Wauaga. We -- we bring a message to your master, Jabba the Hutt.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: ... and a gift.  Gift, what gift?

data.author: Bib
data.text: Nee Jabba no badda. Me chaade su goodie.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: He says that our instructions are to give it only to Jabba himself.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: I'm terribly sorry. I'm afraid he's ever so stubborn about these sort of things.

data.author: Bib
data.text: Nudd Chaa.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Artoo, I have a bad feeling about this.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Good morning.

data.author: Jabba
data.text: Bo Shuda!

data.author: Threepio
data.text: The message, Artoo, the message.

data.author: Luke
data.text: Greetings, Exalted One. Allow me to introduce myself. I am Luke Skywalker, Jedi Knight and friend to Captain Solo. I know that you are powerful, mighty Jabba, and that your anger with Solo must be equally powerful. I seek an audience with Your Greatness to bargain for Solo's life.  With your wisdom, I'm sure that we can work out an arrangement which will be mutually beneficial and enable us to avoid any unpleasant confrontation. As a token of my goodwill, I present to you a gift: these two droids.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: What did he say?

data.author: Luke
data.text: ... Both are hardworking and will serve you well.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: This can't be! Artoo, you're playing the wrong message.

data.author: Jabba
data.text: There will be no bargain.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: We're doomed.

data.author: Jabba
data.text: I will not give up my favorite decoration. I like Captain Solo where he is.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Artoo, look! Captain Solo. And he's still frozen in carbonite.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: What could possibly have come over Master Luke. Is it something I did? He never expressed any unhappiness with my work. Oh! Oh! Hold it! Ohh!

data.author: Ninedenine
data.text: Ah, good. New acquisitions. You are a protocol droid, are you not?

data.author: Threepio
data.text: I am See-Threepio, human-cy...

data.author: Ninedenine
data.text: Yes or no will do.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Oh. Well, yes.

data.author: Ninedenine
data.text: How many languages do you speak?

data.author: Threepio
data.text: I am fluent in over six million forms of communication, and can readily...

data.author: Ninedenine
data.text: Splendid! We have been without an interpreter since our master got angry with our last protocol droid and disintegrated him.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Disintegrated?

data.author: Ninedenine
data.text: Guard! This protocol droid might be useful. Fit him with a restraining bolt and take him back to His Excellency's main audience chamber.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Artoo, don't leave me! Ohhh!

data.author: Ninedenine
data.text: You're a feisty little one, but you'll soon learn some respect. I have need for you on the master's Sail Barge. And I think you'll fit in nicely.

data.author: Jabba
data.text: Da Eitha!

data.author: Oola
data.text: Na Chuba negatorie Na! Na! Natoota...

data.author: Jabba
data.text: Boscka!

data.author: Boushh
data.text: I have come for the bounty on this Wookiee.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Oh, no! Chewbacca!

data.author: Jabba
data.text: At last we have the mighty Chewbacca.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Oh, uh, yes, uh, I am here, Your Worshipfulness. Uh... yes!

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Oh. The illustrious Jabba bids you welcome and will gladly pay you the reward of twenty- five thousand.

data.author: Boushh
data.text: I want fifty thousand. No less.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Uh, oh... but what, what did I say?  Uh, the mighty Jabba asks why he must pay fifty thousand.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Because he's holding a thermal detonator.

data.author: Jabba
data.text: This bounty hunter is my kind of scum. Fearless and inventive.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Jabba offers the sum of thirty-five. And I suggest you take it.

data.author: Boushh
data.text: Zeebuss.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: He agrees!

data.author: Boushh
data.text: Just relax for a moment. You're free of the carbonite.

data.author: Boushh
data.text: Shhh. You have hibernation sickness.

data.author: Han
data.text: I can't see.

data.author: Boushh
data.text: You eyesight will return in time.

data.author: Han
data.text: Where am I?

data.author: Boushh
data.text: Jabba's palace.

data.author: Han
data.text: Who are you?

data.author: Leia
data.text: Someone who loves you.

data.author: Han
data.text: Leia!

data.author: Leia
data.text: I gotta get you out of here.

data.author: Han
data.text: What's that? I know that laugh.

data.author: Han
data.text: Hey, Jabba. Look, Jabba, I was just on my way to pay you back, but I got a little sidetracked. It's not my fault.

data.author: Jabba
data.text: It's too late for that, Solo. You may have been a good smuggler, but now you're Bantha fodder.

data.author: Han
data.text: Look...

data.author: Jabba
data.text: Take him away!

data.author: Han
data.text: Jabba... I'll pay you triple! You're throwing away a fortune here. Don't be a fool!

data.author: Jabba
data.text: Bring her to me.

data.author: Leia
data.text: We have powerful friends. You're gonna regret this...

data.author: Jabba
data.text: I'm sure.

data.author: Leia
data.text: Ugh!

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Ohhh, I can't bear to watch.

data.author: Han
data.text: Chewie? Chewie, is that you?

data.author: Han
data.text: Ah! Chew--Chewie!

data.author: Han
data.text: Wait. I can't see, pal. What's goin' on?

data.author: Han
data.text: Luke? Luke's crazy. He can't even take care of himself, much less rescue anybody.

data.author: Han
data.text: A...Jedi Knight? I--I'm out of it for a little while, everybody gets delusions of grandeur.

data.author: Han
data.text: I'm all right, pal. I'm all right.

data.author: Luke
data.text: I must speak with Jabba.

data.author: Luke
data.text: You will take me to Jabba now!

data.author: Luke
data.text: You serve your master well.

data.author: Luke
data.text: And you will be rewarded.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: At last! Master Luke's come to rescue me.

data.author: Bib
data.text: Master.

data.author: Bib
data.text: ...Luke Skywalker, Jedi Knight.

data.author: Jabba
data.text: I told you not to admit him.

data.author: Luke
data.text: I must be allowed to speak.

data.author: Bib
data.text: He must be allowed to speak.

data.author: Jabba
data.text: You weak-minded fool! He's using an old Jedi mind trick.

data.author: Luke
data.text: You will bring Captain Solo and the Wookiee to me.

data.author: Jabba
data.text: Your mind powers will not work on me, boy.

data.author: Luke
data.text: Nevertheless, I'm taking Captain Solo and his friends. You can either profit by this... or be destroyed! It's your choice. But I warn you not to underestimate my powers.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Master Luke, you're standing on...

data.author: Jabba
data.text: There will be no bargain, young Jedi. I shall enjoy watching you die.

data.author: Jabba
data.text: Bascka!

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Oh, no! The Rancor!

data.author: Jabba
data.text: Bring me Solo and the Wookiee. They will all suffer for this outrage.

data.author: Luke
data.text: Han!

data.author: Han
data.text: Luke!

data.author: Luke
data.text: Are you all right?

data.author: Han
data.text: Fine. Together again, huh?

data.author: Luke
data.text: Wouldn't miss it.

data.author: Han
data.text: How are we doing?

data.author: Luke
data.text: The same as always.

data.author: Han
data.text: That bad, huh? Where's Leia?

data.author: Leia
data.text: I'm here.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Oh, dear. His High Exaltedness, the great Jabba the Hutt, has decreed that you are to be terminated immediately.

data.author: Han
data.text: Good, I hate long waits.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: You will therefore be taken to the Dune Sea and cast into the pit of Carkoon, the nesting place of the all-powerful Sarlacc.

data.author: Han
data.text: Doesn't sound so bad.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: In his belly, you will find a new definition of pain and suffering, as you are slowly digested over a thousand years.

data.author: Han
data.text: On second thought, let's pass on that, huh?

data.author: Luke
data.text: You should have bargained, Jabba. That's the last mistake you'll ever make.

data.author: Han
data.text: I think my eyes are getting better. Instead of a big dark blur, I see a big light blur.

data.author: Luke
data.text: There's nothing to see. I used to live here, you know.

data.author: Han
data.text: You're gonna die here, you know. Convenient.

data.author: Luke
data.text: Just stick close to Chewie and Lando. I've taken care of everything.

data.author: Han
data.text: Oh... great!

data.author: Jabba
data.text: Soon you will learn to appreciate me.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Oh, I'm terribly sor... Artoo! What are you doing here?

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Well, I can see you're serving drinks, but this place is dangerous. They're going to execute Master Luke and, if we're not careful, us too!

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Hmm.  I wish I had your confidence.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Victims of the almighty Sarlacc: His Excellency hopes that you will die honorably. But should any of you wish to beg for mercy, the great Jabba the Hutt will now listen to your pleas.

data.author: Han
data.text: Threepio, you tell that slimy piece of... worm-ridden filth he'll get no such pleasure from us. Right?

data.author: Luke
data.text: Jabba! This is your last chance. Free us or die.

data.author: Jabba
data.text: Move him into position.

data.author: Jabba
data.text: Put him in.

data.author: Luke
data.text: Easy, Chewie.

data.author: Lando
data.text: Whoa! Whoa! Help!

data.author: Han
data.text: Chewie, you okay? Where is he?

data.author: Han
data.text: I'm okay, pal.

data.author: Lando
data.text: Han! Chewie?

data.author: Han
data.text: Lando!

data.author: Han
data.text: Boba Fett?! Boba Fett?! Where?

data.author: Han
data.text: Lando, grab it!

data.author: Lando
data.text: Lower it!

data.author: Han
data.text: I'm trying!

data.author: Han
data.text: Whoa! Whoa! Grab me, Chewie! I'm slipping.

data.author: Han
data.text: Grab it! L--Lando. Grab!

data.author: Han
data.text: Grab it! Almost... You almost got it!

data.author: Lando
data.text: Hold it! Whoa!

data.author: Han
data.text: Gently now. All... all right. Now easy, easy. Hold me, Chewie.

data.author: Han
data.text: Chewie! Chewie, give me the gun. Don't move, Lando.

data.author: Lando
data.text: No, wait! I thought you were blind!

data.author: Han
data.text: It's all right. Trust me. Don't move.

data.author: Lando
data.text: All right! A little higher! Just a little higher!

data.author: Han
data.text: Chewie, Pull us up! Come on! Okay... up, Chewie, up!

data.author: Leia
data.text: Come on. We gotta get out of here quick.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Not my eyes! Artoo, help! Quickly, Artoo. Oh! Ohhh! You beast!

data.author: Luke
data.text: Get the gun! Point it at the deck!

data.author: Luke
data.text: Point it at the deck!

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Artoo, where are we going? I couldn't possibly jump.

data.author: Luke
data.text: Come on!

data.author: Luke
data.text: Let's go! And don't forget the droids.

data.author: Lando
data.text: We're on our way.

data.author: Han
data.text: I don't know. All I can see is a lot of blowing sand!

data.author: Leia
data.text: That's all any of us can see.

data.author: Han
data.text: Then I guess I'm getting better.

data.author: Han
data.text: I've got to hand it to you, kid, you were pretty good out there.

data.author: Luke
data.text: I had a lot of help. Think nothing of it.

data.author: Han
data.text: No, I'm thinking a lot about it. That carbon freeze was the closest thing to dead there is. And it wasn't just sleepin'. It was a big wide awake nothing!

data.author: Luke
data.text: I'll see you back at the fleet.

data.author: Han
data.text: Why don't you leave that crate and come with us?

data.author: Luke
data.text: I have a promise I have to keep first... to an old friend.

data.author: Han
data.text: Guess I owe you some thanks, too, Lando.

data.author: Lando
data.text: Figured if I left you frozen like that you'd just give me bad luck the rest of my life, so I might as well get you unfrozen sooner or later.

data.author: Leia
data.text: He means \"You're welcome.\"

data.author: Lando
data.text: Come on, let's get off this miserable dust ball.

data.author: Luke
data.text: I'll meet you back at the fleet.

data.author: Leia
data.text: Hurry. The Alliance should be assembled by now.

data.author: Luke
data.text: I will.

data.author: Han
data.text: Hey, Luke, thanks. Thanks for comin' after me. Now I owe you one.

data.author: Luke
data.text: That's right, Artoo. We're going to the  Dagobah system. I have a promise to keep...  to an old friend.

data.author: Emperor
data.text: Rise, my friend.

data.author: Vader
data.text: The Death Star will be completed on schedule.

data.author: Emperor
data.text: You have done well, Lord Vader. And now I sense you wish to continue your search for young Skywalker.

data.author: Vader
data.text: Yes, my Master.

data.author: Emperor
data.text: Patience, my friend. In time he will seek you out. And when he does, you must bring him before me. He has grown strong. Only together can we turn him to the dark side of the Force.

data.author: Vader
data.text: As you wish.

data.author: Emperor
data.text: Everything is proceeding as I have foreseen.

data.author: Yoda
data.text: Hmm. That face you make. Look I so old to young eyes?

data.author: Luke
data.text: No... of course not.

data.author: Yoda
data.text: I do, yes, I do!  Sick have I become. Old and weak.  When nine hundred years old you reach, look as good you will not. Hmm?

data.author: Yoda
data.text: Soon will I rest. Yes, forever sleep. Earned it, I have.

data.author: Luke
data.text: Master Yoda, you can't die.

data.author: Yoda
data.text: Strong am I with the Force... but not that strong! Twilight is upon me and soon night must fall. That is the way of things ... the way of the Force.

data.author: Luke
data.text: But I need your help. I've come back to complete the training.

data.author: Yoda
data.text: No more training do you require. Already know you that which you need.

data.author: Luke
data.text: Then I am a Jedi?

data.author: Yoda
data.text: Ohhh. Not yet. One thing remains: Vader. You must confront Vader. Then, only then, a Jedi will you be. And confront him you will.

data.author: Luke
data.text: Master Yoda... is Darth Vader my father?

data.author: Yoda
data.text: Mmm... rest I need. Yes... rest.

data.author: Luke
data.text: Yoda, I must know.

data.author: Yoda
data.text: Your father he is.

data.author: Yoda
data.text: Told you, did he?

data.author: Luke
data.text: Yes.

data.author: Yoda
data.text: Unexpected this is, and unfortunate..

data.author: Luke
data.text: Unfortunate that I know the truth?

data.author: Yoda
data.text: No. Unfortunate that you rushed to face him... that incomplete was your training. Not ready for the burden were you.

data.author: Luke
data.text: Well, I'm sorry.

data.author: Yoda
data.text: Remember, a Jedi's strength flows from the Force.  But beware.  Anger, fear, aggression. The dark side are they.  Once you start down the dark path, forever will it dominate your destiny.

data.author: Yoda
data.text: Luke...Luke...Do not...Do not underestimate the powers of the Emperor, or suffer your father's fate, you will. Luke, when gone am I , the last of the Jedi will you be. Luke, the Force runs strong in your family. Pass on what you have learned, Luke...  There is... another...Sky...Sky...walker.

data.author: Luke
data.text: I can't do it, Artoo. I can't go on alone.

data.author: Ben
data.text: Yoda will always be with you.

data.author: Luke
data.text: Obi-Wan! Why didn't you tell me?

data.author: Luke
data.text: You told me Vader betrayed and murdered my father.

data.author: Ben
data.text: You father was seduced by the dark side of the Force. He ceased to be Anakin Skywalker and became Darth Vader. When that happened, the good man who was your father was destroyed. So what I have told you was true... from a certain point of view.

data.author: Luke
data.text: A certain point of view!

data.author: Ben
data.text: Luke, you're going to find that many of the truths we cling to depend greatly on our own point of view.

data.author: Ben
data.text: I don't blame you for being angry. If I was wrong in what I did, it certainly wouldn't have been for the first time. You see, what happened to your father was my fault.

data.author: Ben
data.text: Anakin was a good friend.

data.author: Ben
data.text: When I first knew him, your father was already a great pilot. But I was amazed how strongly the Force was with him.  I took it upon myself to train him as a Jedi.  I thought that I could instruct him just as well as Yoda.  I was wrong.  My pride has had terrible consequences for the galaxy.

data.author: Luke
data.text: There's still good in him.

data.author: Ben
data.text: I also thought he could be turned back to the good side. It couldn't be done. He is more machine now than man. Twisted and evil.

data.author: Luke
data.text: I can't do it, Ben.

data.author: Ben
data.text: You cannot escape your destiny.

data.author: Luke
data.text: I tried to stop him once. I couldn't do it.

data.author: Ben
data.text: Vader humbled you when first you met him, Luke...but that experience was part of your training. It taught you, among other things, the value of patience.  Had you not been so impatient to defeat Vader then, you could have finished your training here with Yoda. You would have been prepared.

data.author: Luke
data.text: But I had to help my friends.

data.author: Ben
data.text: And did you help them? It was they who had to save you. You achieved little by rushing back prematurely, I fear.

data.author: Luke
data.text: I found out Darth Vader was my father.

data.author: Ben
data.text: To be a Jedi, Luke, you must confront and then go beyond the dark side - the side your father couldn't get past. Impatience is the easiest door - for you, like your father. Only, your father was seduced by what he found on the other side of the door, and you have held firm. You're no longer so reckless now, Luke. You are strong and patient. And now, you must face Darth Vader again!

data.author: Luke
data.text: I can't kill my own father.

data.author: Ben
data.text: Then the Emperor has already won. You were our only hope.

data.author: Luke
data.text: Yoda spoke of another.

data.author: Ben
data.text: The other he spoke of is your twin sister.

data.author: Luke
data.text: But I have no sister.

data.author: Ben
data.text: Hmm. To protect you both from the Emperor, you were hidden from your father when you were born. The Emperor knew, as I did, if Anakin were to have any offspring, they would be a threat to him. That is the reason why your sister remains safely anonymous.

data.author: Luke
data.text: Leia! Leia's my sister.

data.author: Ben
data.text: Your insight serves you well. Bury your feelings deep down, Luke. They do you credit. But they could be made to serve the Emperor.

data.author: Ben
data.text: When your father left, he didn't know your mother was pregnant.
