Your mother and I knew he would find out eventually, but we wanted to keep you both as safe as possible, for as long as possible.  So I took you to live with my brother Owen on Tatooine... and your mother took Leia to live as the daughter of Senator Organa, on Alderaan.

data.author: Ben
data.text: The Organa household was high-born and politically quite powerful in that system. Leia became a princess by virtue of lineage... no one knew she'd been adopted, of course. But it was a title without real power, since Alderaan had long been a democracy.  Even so, the family continued to be politically powerful, and Leia, following in her foster father's path, became a senator as well.  That's not all she became, of course... she became the leader of her cell in the Alliance against the corrupt Empire. And because she had diplomatic immunity, she was a vital link for getting information to the Rebel cause.  That's what she was doing when her path crossed yours... for her foster parents had always told her to contact me on Tatooine, if her troubles became desperate.

data.author: Luke
data.text: But you can't let her get involved now, Ben. Vader will destroy her.

data.author: Ben
data.text: She hasn't been trained in the ways of the Jedi the way you have, Luke ... but the Force is strong with her, as it is with all of your family. There is no avoiding the battle. You must face and destroy Vader!

data.author: Han
data.text: Well, look at you, a general, huh?

data.author: Lando
data.text: Oh, well, someone must have told them about my little maneuver at the battle of Taanab.

data.author: Han
data.text: Well, don't look at me, pal. I just said you were a fair pilot. I didn't know they were lookin' for somebody to lead this crazy attack.

data.author: Lando
data.text: I'm surprised they didn't ask you to do it.

data.author: Han
data.text: Well, who says they didn't.  But I ain't crazy. You're the respectable one, remember?

data.author: Mon Mothma
data.text: The Emperor has made a critical error and the time for our attack has come.

data.author: Mon Mothma
data.text: The data brought to us by the Bothan spies pinpoints the exact location of the Emperor's new battle station. We also know that the weapon systems of this Death Star are not yet operational. With the Imperial Fleet spread throughout the galaxy in a vain effort to engage us, it is relatively unprotected. But most important of all, we've learned that the Emperor himself is personally overseeing the final stages of the construction of this Death Star.

data.author: Mon Mothma
data.text: Many Bothans died to bring us this information. Admiral Ackbar, please.

data.author: Ackbar
data.text: You can see here the Death Star orbiting the forest Moon of Endor. Although the weapon systems on this Death Star are not yet operational, the Death Star does have a strong defense mechanism. It is protected by an energy shield, which is generated from the nearby forest Moon of Endor. The shield must be deactivated if any attack is to be attempted. Once the shield is down, our cruisers will create a perimeter, while the fighters fly into the superstructure and attempt to knock out the main reactor.

data.author: Ackbar
data.text: General Calrissian has volunteered to lead the fighter attack

data.author: Han
data.text: Good luck.

data.author: Han
data.text: You're gonna need it.

data.author: Ackbar
data.text: General Madine.

data.author: General Madine
data.text: We have stolen a small Imperial shuttle. Disguised as a cargo ship, and using a secret Imperial code, a strike team will land on the moon and deactivate the shield generator.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Sounds dangerous.

data.author: Leia
data.text: I wonder who they found to pull that off.

data.author: General Madine
data.text: General Solo, is your strike team assembled?

data.author: Han
data.text: Uh, my team's ready. I don't have a command crew for the shuttle.

data.author: Han
data.text: Well, it's gonna be rough, pal. I didn't want to speak for you.

data.author: Han
data.text: That's one.

data.author: Leia
data.text: Uh, General... count me in.

data.author: Voice
data.text: I'm with you, too!

data.author: Leia
data.text: What is it?

data.author: Luke
data.text: Ask me again sometime.

data.author: Han
data.text: Luke.

data.author: Luke
data.text: Hi, Han... Chewie.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: \"Exciting\" is hardly the word I would use.

data.author: Han
data.text: Look. I want you to take her. I mean it. Take her. You need all the help you can get. She's the fastest ship in the fleet.

data.author: Lando
data.text: All right, old buddy. You know, I know what she means to you. I'll take good care of her. She-she won't get a scratch. All right?

data.author: Han
data.text: Right. I got your promise now. Not a scratch.

data.author: Lando
data.text: Look, would you get going, you pirate.

data.author: Lando
data.text: Good luck.

data.author: Han
data.text: You, too.

data.author: Han
data.text: You got her warmed?

data.author: Luke
data.text: Yeah, she's comin' up.

data.author: Han
data.text: No. I don't think the Empire had Wookiees in mind when they designed her, Chewie.

data.author: Leia
data.text: Hey, are you awake?

data.author: Han
data.text: Yeah, I just got a funny feeling. Like I'm not gonna see her again.

data.author: Leia
data.text: Come on, General, let's move.

data.author: Han
data.text: Right. Chewie, let's see what this piece of junk can do. Ready, everybody?

data.author: Luke
data.text: All set.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Here we go again.

data.author: Han
data.text: All right, hang on.

data.author: Vader
data.text: What is thy bidding, my Master?

data.author: Emperor
data.text: Send the fleet to the far side of Endor. There it will stay until called for.

data.author: Vader
data.text: What of the reports of the Rebel fleet massing near Sullust?

data.author: Emperor
data.text: It is of no concern. Soon the Rebellion will be crushed and young Skywalker will be one of us! Your work here is finished, my friend. Go out to the command ship and await my orders.

data.author: Vader
data.text: Yes, my Master.

data.author: Han
data.text: If they don't go for this, we're gonna have to get outta here pretty quick, Chewie.

data.author: Controller
data.text: We have you on our screen now. Please identify.

data.author: Han
data.text: Shuttle Tydirium requesting deactivation of the deflector shield.

data.author: Controller
data.text: Shuttle Tydirium, transmit the clearance code for shield passage.

data.author: Han
data.text: Transmission commencing.

data.author: Leia
data.text: Now we find out if that code is worth the price we paid.

data.author: Han
data.text: It'll work. It'll work.

data.author: Luke
data.text: Vader's on that ship.

data.author: Han
data.text: Now don't get jittery, Luke. There are a lot of command ships. Keep your distance though, Chewie, but don't look like you're trying to keep your distance.

data.author: Han
data.text: I don't know.  Fly casual.

data.author: Luke
data.text: I'm endangering the mission. I shouldn't have come.

data.author: Han
data.text: It's your imagination, kid. Come on. Let's keep a little optimism here.

data.author: Vader
data.text: Where is that shuttle going?

data.author: Piett
data.text: Shuttle Tydirium, what is your cargo and destination?

data.author: Pilot Voice
data.text: Parts and technical crew for the forest moon.

data.author: Vader
data.text: Do they have a code clearance?

data.author: Piett
data.text: It's an older code, sir, but it checks out. I was about to clear them.

data.author: Piett
data.text: Shall I hold them?

data.author: Vader
data.text: No. Leave them to me. I will deal with them myself.

data.author: Piett
data.text: As you wish, my lord.  Carry on.

data.author: Han
data.text: They're not goin' for it, Chewie.

data.author: Controller
data.text: Shuttle Tydirium, deactivation of the shield will commence immediately. Follow your present course.

data.author: Han
data.text: Okay! I told you it was gonna work. No problem.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Oh, I told you it was dangerous here.

data.author: Leia
data.text: Shall we try and go around?

data.author: Han
data.text: It'll take time. This whole party'll be for nothing if they see us.

data.author: Han
data.text: Chewie and I will take care of this. You stay here.

data.author: Luke
data.text: Quietly, there might be more of them out there.

data.author: Han
data.text: Hey... it's me.

data.author: Scout #1
data.text: Go for help! Go!

data.author: Luke
data.text: Great. Come on.

data.author: Leia
data.text: Over there! Two more of them!

data.author: Luke
data.text: I see them. Wait, Leia!

data.author: Luke
data.text: Quick! Jam their comlink. Center switch!

data.author: Han
data.text: Hey, wait! Ahhh!

data.author: Luke
data.text: Move closer!

data.author: Luke
data.text: Get alongside that one!

data.author: Luke
data.text: Get him!

data.author: Luke
data.text: Keep on that one! I'll take these two!

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Oh, General Solo, somebody's coming. Oh!

data.author: Han
data.text: Luke! Where's Leia?

data.author: Luke
data.text: What? She didn't come back?

data.author: Han
data.text: I thought she was with you.

data.author: Luke
data.text: We got separated.

data.author: Luke
data.text: Hey, we better go look for her.

data.author: Han
data.text: Take the squad ahead.  We'll meet at the shield generator at 0300.

data.author: Luke
data.text: Come on, Artoo.  We'll need your scanners.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Don't worry, Master Luke.  We know what to do.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: And you said it was pretty here. Ugh!

data.author: Leia
data.text: Cut it out!

data.author: Leia
data.text: I'm not gonna hurt you.

data.author: Leia
data.text: Well, looks like I'm stuck here. Trouble is, I don't know where here is.

data.author: Leia
data.text: Well, maybe you can help me. Come on, sit down.

data.author: Leia
data.text: I promise I won't hurt you. Now come here.

data.author: Leia
data.text: All right. You want something to eat?

data.author: Leia
data.text: That's right. Come on. Hmmm?

data.author: Leia
data.text: Look, it's a hat. It's not gonna hurt you. Look. You're a jittery little thing, aren't you?

data.author: Leia
data.text: What is it?

data.author: Scout #L
data.text: Freeze!  Come on, get up!

data.author: Scout #1
data.text: Go get your ride and take her back to base.

data.author: Scout #2
data.text: Yes, sir.

data.author: Leia
data.text: Come on, let's get outta here.

data.author: Guard
data.text: Halt! The Emperor does not wish to be disturbed at the moment.

data.author: Vader
data.text: The Emperor will see me, now!

data.author: Guard
data.text: The Emperor will see you, now.

data.author: Emperor
data.text: I told you to remain on the command ship.

data.author: Vader
data.text: A small Rebel force has penetrated the shield and landed on Endor.

data.author: Emperor
data.text: Yes, I know.

data.author: Vader
data.text: My son is with them.

data.author: Emperor
data.text: Are you sure?

data.author: Vader
data.text: I have felt him, my Master.

data.author: Emperor
data.text: Strange, that I have not. I wonder if your feelings on this matter are clear, Lord Vader.

data.author: Vader
data.text: They are clear, my Master.

data.author: Emperor
data.text: Then you must go to the Sanctuary Moon and wait for them.

data.author: Vader
data.text: He will come to me?

data.author: Emperor
data.text: I have foreseen it. His compassion for you will be his undoing. He will come to you and then you will bring him before me.

data.author: Vader
data.text: As you wish.

data.author: Han
data.text: Luke! Luke!

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Oh, Master Luke.

data.author: Luke
data.text: There's two more wrecked speeders back there. And I found this.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: I'm afraid that Artoo's sensors can find no trace of Princess Leia.

data.author: Han
data.text: I hope she's alright.

data.author: Han
data.text: What, Chewie? What? Chewie!

data.author: Han
data.text: Hey, I don't get it.

data.author: Han
data.text: Nah, it's just a dead animal, Chewie.

data.author: Luke
data.text: Chewie, wa-wait!  Don't!

data.author: Han
data.text: Nice work. Great, Chewie! Great! Always thinking with your stomach.

data.author: Luke
data.text: Will you take it easy? Let's just figure out a way to get out of this thing.  Han, can you reach my lightsaber?

data.author: Han
data.text: Yeah, sure.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Artoo, I'm not sure that's such a good idea. It's a very long dro-o-op!!

data.author: Han
data.text: Wha--?  Hey!  Point that thing someplace else.

data.author: Han
data.text: Hey!

data.author: Luke
data.text: Han, don't. It'll be all right.

data.author: Luke
data.text: Chewie, give 'em your crossbow.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Oh, my head. Oh, my goodness!

data.author: Luke
data.text: Do you understand anything they're saying?

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Oh, yes, Master Luke!  Remember that I am fluent in over six million forms of communication.

data.author: Han
data.text: What are you telling them?

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Hello, I think... I could be mistaken. They're using a very primitive dialect.  But I do believe they think I am some sort of god.

data.author: Han
data.text: Well, why don't you use your divine influence and get us out of this?

data.author: Threepio
data.text: I beg your pardon, General Solo, but that just wouldn't be proper.

data.author: Han
data.text: Proper?!

data.author: Threepio
data.text: It's against my programming to impersonate a deity.

data.author: Han
data.text: Why, you--

data.author: Han
data.text: My mistake. He's an old friend of mine.

data.author: Han
data.text: I have a really bad feeling about this.

data.author: Han
data.text: What did he say?

data.author: Threepio
data.text: I'm rather embarrassed, General Solo, but it appears you are to be the main course at a banquet in my honor.

data.author: Han and Luke
data.text: Leia!

data.author: Leia
data.text: Oh!

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Your Royal Highness.

data.author: Leia
data.text: But these are my friends. Threepio, tell them they must be set free.

data.author: Han
data.text: Somehow, I got the feeling that didn't help us very much.

data.author: Luke
data.text: Threepio, tell them if they don't do as you wish, you'll become angry and use your magic.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: But Master Luke, what magic? couldn't possibly --

data.author: Luke
data.text: Just tell them.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: You see, Master Luke

data.author: Threepio
data.text: ... as I said they wouldn't. Wha-wha-what's happening! Oh! Oh, dear! Oh!

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Put me down! He-e-elp! Master Luke! Artoo! Somebody, somebody, help! Master Luke, Artoo! Artoo, quickly! Do something, somebody! Oh! Ohhh!

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Oh, oh, oh, oh! Thank goodness.

data.author: Luke
data.text: Thanks, Threepio.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: I...I never knew I had it in me.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Yes, Artoo. I was just coming to that.

data.author: Han
data.text: What's going on?

data.author: Leia
data.text: I don't know.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Wonderful! We are now a part of the tribe.

data.author: Han
data.text: Just what I always wanted.

data.author: Han
data.text: Well, short help is better than no help at all, Chewie.  Thank you. Okay.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: He says the scouts are going to show us the quickest way to the shield generator.

data.author: Han
data.text: Good. How far is it? Ask him. We need some fresh supplies, too. And try and get our weapons back.

data.author: Han
data.text: And hurry up, will ya? I haven't got all day.

data.author: Luke
data.text: Luke, what's wrong?

data.author: Luke
data.text: Leia... do you remember your mother? Your real mother?

data.author: Leia
data.text: Just a little bit. She died when I was very young.

data.author: Luke
data.text: What do you remember?

data.author: Leia
data.text: Just...images, really. Feelings.

data.author: Luke
data.text: Tell me.

data.author: Leia
data.text: She was very beautiful. Kind, but...sad.  Why are you asking me all this?

data.author: Luke
data.text: I have no memory of my mother. I never knew her.

data.author: Leia
data.text: Luke, tell me. What's troubling you?

data.author: Luke
data.text: Vader is here...now, on this moon.

data.author: Leia
data.text: How do you know?

data.author: Luke
data.text: I felt his presence. He's come for me. He can feel when I'm near. That's why I have to go.  As long as I stay, I'm endangering the group and our mission here.  I have to face him.

data.author: Leia
data.text: Why?

data.author: Luke
data.text: He's my father.

data.author: Leia
data.text: Your father?

data.author: Luke
data.text: There's more. It won't be easy for you to hear it, but you must. If I don't make it back, you're the only hope for the Alliance.

data.author: Leia
data.text: Luke, don't talk that way. You have a power I--I don't understand and could never have.

data.author: Luke
data.text: You're wrong, Leia. You have that power too. In time you'll learn to use it as I have. The Force is strong in my family. My father has it...I have it...and...my sister has it.

data.author: Luke
data.text: Yes. It's you Leia.

data.author: Leia
data.text: I know. Somehow...I've always known.

data.author: Luke
data.text: Then you know why I have to face him.

data.author: Leia
data.text: No! Luke, run away, far away. If he can feel your presence, then leave this place. I wish I could go with you.

data.author: Luke
data.text: No, you don't. You've always been strong.

data.author: Leia
data.text: But, why must you confront him?

data.author: Luke
data.text: Because...there is good in him. I've felt it. He won't turn me over to the Emperor. I can save him. I can turn him back to the good side. I have to try.

data.author: Han
data.text: Hey, what's goin' on?

data.author: Leia
data.text: Nothing. I - just want to be alone for a little while.

data.author: Han
data.text: Nothing?  Come on, tell me.  What's goin' on?

data.author: Leia
data.text: I...I can't tell you.

data.author: Han
data.text: Did you tell Luke? Is that who you could tell?

data.author: Han
data.text: Ahhh...

data.author: Han
data.text: I'm sorry.

data.author: Leia
data.text: Hold me.

data.author: Commander
data.text: This is a Rebel that surrendered to us. Although he denies it, I believe there may be more of them, and I request permission to conduct a further search of the area.

data.author: Commander
data.text: He was armed only with this.

data.author: Vader
data.text: Good work, Commander. Leave us. Conduct your search and bring his companions to me.

data.author: Commander
data.text: Yes, my Lord.

data.author: Vader
data.text: The Emperor has been expecting you.

data.author: Luke
data.text: I know, father.

data.author: Vader
data.text: So, you have accepted the truth.

data.author: Luke
data.text: I've accepted the truth that you were once Anakin Skywalker, my father.

data.author: Vader
data.text: That name no longer has any meaning for me.

data.author: Luke
data.text: It is the name of your true self. You've only forgotten. I know there is good in you. The Emperor hasn't driven it from you fully. That is why you couldn't destroy me. That's why you won't bring me to your Emperor now.

data.author: Vader
data.text: I see you have constructed a new lightsaber.

data.author: Vader
data.text: Your skills are complete. Indeed, you are powerful, as the Emperor has foreseen.

data.author: Luke
data.text: Come with me.

data.author: Vader
data.text: Obi-Wan once thought as you do.

data.author: Vader
data.text: You don't know the power of the dark side. I must obey my master.

data.author: Luke
data.text: I will not turn...and you'll be forced to kill me.

data.author: Vader
data.text: If that is your destiny.

data.author: Luke
data.text: Search your feelings, father. You can't do this. I feel the conflict within you. Let go of your hate.

data.author: Vader
data.text: It is too late for me, son. The Emperor will show you the true nature of the Force. He is your master now.

data.author: Luke
data.text: Then my father is truly dead.

data.author: Leia
data.text: The main entrance to the control bunker's on the far side of that landing platform. This isn't gonna be easy.

data.author: Han
data.text: Hey, don't worry. Chewie and me got into a lot of places more heavily guarded than this.

data.author: Leia
data.text: What's he saying?

data.author: Threepio
data.text: He says there's a secret entrance on the other side of the ridge.

data.author: Lando
data.text: Admiral, we're in position. All fighters accounted for.

data.author: Ackbar
data.text: Proceed with the countdown. All groups assume attack coordinates.

data.author: Lando
data.text: Don't worry, my friends are down there. They'll have that shield down on time... or this'll be the shortest offensive of all time.

data.author: Ackbar
data.text: All craft, prepare to jump to hyperspace on my mark.

data.author: Lando
data.text: All right. Stand by.

data.author: Han
data.text: Back door, huh? Good idea.

data.author: Han
data.text: It's only a few guards. This shouldn't be too much trouble.

data.author: Leia
data.text: Well, it only takes one to sound the alarm.

data.author: Han
data.text: Then we'll do it real quiet-like.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Oh! Oh, my. Uh, Princess Leia!

data.author: Leia
data.text: Quiet.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: I'm afraid our furry companion has gone and done something rather rash.

data.author: Leia
data.text: Oh, no.

data.author: Han
data.text: There goes our surprise attack.

data.author: Scout
data.text: Look! Over there! Stop him!

data.author: Han
data.text: Not bad for a little furball. There's only one left. You stay here. We'll take care of this.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: I have decided that we shall stay here.

data.author: Emperor
data.text: Welcome, young Skywalker. I have been expecting you.

data.author: Emperor
data.text: You no longer need those.

data.author: Emperor
data.text: Guards, leave us.

data.author: Emperor
data.text: I'm looking forward to completing your training. In time you will call me Master.

data.author: Luke
data.text: You're gravely mistaken. You won't convert me as you did my father.

data.author: Emperor
data.text: Oh, no, my young Jedi. You will find that it is you who are mistaken...about a great many things.

data.author: Vader
data.text: His lightsaber.

data.author: Emperor
data.text: Ah, yes, a Jedi's weapon. Much like your father's. By now you must know your father can never be turned from the dark side. So will it be with you.

data.author: Luke
data.text: You're wrong. Soon I'll be dead...and you with me.

data.author: Emperor
data.text: Perhaps you refer to the imminent attack of your Rebel fleet.

data.author: Emperor
data.text: Yes...I assure you we are quite safe from your friends here.

data.author: Luke
data.text: Your overconfidence is your weakness.

data.author: Emperor
data.text: Your faith in your friends is yours.

data.author: Vader
data.text: It is pointless to resist, my son.

data.author: Emperor
data.text: Everything that has transpired has done so according to my design.  Your friends up there on the Sanctuary Moon...

data.author: Emperor
data.text: ...are walking into a trap. As is your Rebel fleet! It was I who allowed the Alliance to know the location of the shield generator. It is quite safe from your pitiful little band. An entire legion of my best troops awaits them.

data.author: Emperor
data.text: Oh...I'm afraid the deflector shield will be quite operational when your friends arrive.

data.author: Han
data.text: All right! Up! Move! Come on! Quickly! Quickly, Chewie.

data.author: Leia
data.text: Han! Hurry! The fleet will be here any moment.

data.author: Han
data.text: Charges!  Come on, come on!

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Oh, my! They'll be captured!

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Wa-wait! Wait, come back! Artoo, stay with me.

data.author: Commander
data.text: Freeze! You Rebel scum.

data.author: Lando
data.text: All wings report in.

data.author: Wedge
data.text: Red Leader standing by.

data.author: Gray Leader
data.text: Gray Leader standing by.

data.author: Green Leader
data.text: Green Leader standing by.

data.author: Wedge
data.text: Lock S-foils in attack positions.

data.author: Ackbar
data.text: May the Force be with us.

data.author: Lando
data.text: We've got to be able to get some kind of a reading on that shield, up or down. Well, how could they be jamming us if they don't know if we're coming.

data.author: Lando
data.text: Break off the attack! The shield is still up.

data.author: Red Leader
data.text: I get no reading. Are you sure?

data.author: Lando
data.text: Pull up! All craft pull up!

data.author: Ackbar
data.text: Take evasive action! Green Group, stick close to holding sector MV-7.

data.author: Controller
data.text: Admiral, we have enemy ships in sector 47.

data.author: Ackbar
data.text: It's a trap!

data.author: Lando
data.text: Fighters coming in.

data.author: Rebel Pilot
data.text: There's too many of them!

data.author: Lando
data.text: Accelerate to attack speed! Draw their fire away from the cruisers.

data.author: Wedge
data.text: Copy, Gold Leader.

data.author: Emperor
data.text: Come, boy. See for yourself.

data.author: Emperor
data.text: From here you will witness the final destruction of the Alliance, and the end of your insignificant Rebellion.

data.author: Emperor
data.text: You want this, don't you? The hate is swelling in you now. Take your Jedi weapon. Use it. I am unarmed. Strike me down with it. Give in to your anger. With each passing moment, you make yourself more my servant.

data.author: Luke
data.text: No!

data.author: Emperor
data.text: It is unavoidable. It is your destiny. You, like your father, are now mine!

data.author: Stormtrooper
data.text: All right, move it! I said move it! Go on!

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Hello! I say, over there! Were you looking for me?

data.author: Bunker Commander
data.text: Bring those two down here!

data.author: Stormtrooper
data.text: Let's go!

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Well, they're on their way. Artoo, are you sure this was a good idea?

data.author: Stormtrooper
data.text: Freeze! Don't move!

data.author: Threepio
data.text: We surrender.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Ohhh! Stand back, Artoo.

data.author: Leia
data.text: The code's changed. We need Artoo!

data.author: Han
data.text: Here's the terminal.

data.author: Leia
data.text: Artoo, where are you? We need you at the bunker right away.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Going? What do you mean, you're going. But-- but going where, Artoo? No, what! Artoo! Oh, this is no time for heroics. Come back!

data.author: Lando
data.text: Watch yourself, Wedge! Three from above!

data.author: Wedge
data.text: Red Three, Red Two, pull in!

data.author: Red Two
data.text: Got it!

data.author: Red Three
data.text: Three of them coming in, twenty degrees!

data.author: Wedge
data.text: Cut to the left! I'll take the leader! They're heading for the medical frigate.

data.author: Navigator
data.text: Pressure's steady.

data.author: Lando
data.text: Only the fighters are attacking.  I wonder what those Star Destroyers are waiting for.

data.author: Commander
data.text: We're in attack position now, sir.

data.author: Piett
data.text: Hold here.

data.author: Commander
data.text: We're not going to attack?

data.author: Piett
data.text: I have my orders from the Emperor himself. He has something special planned for them. We only need to keep them from escaping.

data.author: Emperor
data.text: As you can see, my young apprentice, your friends have failed. Now witness the firepower of this fully armed and operational battle station.  Fire at will, Commander.

data.author: Jerjerrod
data.text: Fire!

data.author: Lando
data.text: That blast came from the Death Star! That thing's operational!  Home One, this is Gold Leader.

data.author: Ackbar
data.text: We saw it. All craft prepare to retreat.

data.author: Lando
data.text: You won't get another chance at this, Admiral.

data.author: Ackbar
data.text: We have no choice, General Calrissian. Our cruisers can't repel firepower of that magnitude.

data.author: Lando
data.text: Han will have that shield down. We've got to give him more time.

data.author: Threepio
data.text: We're coming!

data.author: Han
data.text: Come on! Come on!

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Oh, Artoo, hurry!

data.author: Threepio
data.text: My goodness! Artoo, why did you have to be so brave?

data.author: Han
data.text: Well, I suppose I could hotwire this thing.

data.author: Leia
data.text: I'll cover you.

data.author: Lando
data.text: Yes! I said closer! Move as close as you can and engage those Star Destroyers at point- blank range.

data.author: Ackbar
data.text: At that close range, we won't last long against those Star Destroyers.

data.author: Lando
data.text: We'll last longer then we will against that Death Star...and we might just take a few of them with us.

data.author: Rebel Pilot
data.text: She's gonna blow!

data.author: Y-wing Pilot
data.text: I'm hit!

data.author: Emperor
data.text: Your fleet has lost. And your friends on the Endor moon will not survive. There is no escape, my young apprentice. The Alliance will die...as will your friends.

data.author: Emperor
data.text: Good. I can feel your anger. I am defenseless.  Take your weapon! Strike me down with all your hatred, and your journey towards the dark side will be complete.

data.author: Walker pilot #1
data.text: Look!

data.author: Pilot #2
data.text: Get him off of there!

data.author: Han
data.text: I think I got it. I got it!

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Oh, Princess Leia, are you all right?

data.author: Han
data.text: Let's see.

data.author: Leia
data.text: It's not bad.

data.author: Stormtrooper
data.text: Freeze!

data.author: Threepio
data.text: Oh, dear.

data.author: Stormtrooper
data.text: Don't move!

data.author: Han
data.text: I love you.

data.author: Leia
data.text: I know.

data.author: Stormtrooper
data.text: Hands up! Stand up!

data.author: Han
data.text: Stay back.

data.author: Han
data.text: Chewie!  Get down here!  She's wounded!  No, wait....  I got an idea.

data.author: Emperor
data.text: Good.  Use your aggressive feelings, boy!  Let the hate flow through you.

data.author: Vader
data.text: Obi-Wan has taught you well.

data.author: Luke
data.text: I will not fight you, father.

data.author: Vader
data.text: You are unwise to lower your defenses.

data.author: Luke
data.text: Your thoughts betray you, father. I feel the good in you...the conflict.

data.author: Vader
data.text: There is no conflict.

data.author: Luke
data.text: You couldn't bring yourself to kill me before, and I don't believe you'll destroy me now.

data.author: Vader
data.text: You underestimate the power of the dark side. If you will not fight, then you will meet your destiny.

data.author: Emperor
data.text: Good.  Good.

data.author: Lando
data.text: Watch out. Squad at .06.

data.author: Rebel Pilot
data.text: I'm on it, Gold Leader.

data.author: Wedge
data.text: Good shot, Red Two.

data.author: Lando
data.text: Now...come on, Han, old buddy. Don't let me down.

data.author: Han/Pilot
data.text: It's over, Commander. The Rebels have been routed. They're fleeing into the woods. We need reinforcements to continue the pursuit.

data.author: Control room Commander
data.text: Send three squads to help. Open the back door.

data.author: Second Commander
data.text: Yes, sir.

data.author: Han
data.text: Throw me another charge.

data.author: Vader
data.text: You cannot hide forever, Luke.

data.author: Luke
data.text: I will not fight you.

data.author: Vader
data.text: Give yourself to the dark side. It is the only way you can save your friends. Yes, your thoughts betray you. Your feelings for them are strong. Especially for...

data.author: Vader
data.text: Sister! So...you have a twin sister. Your feelings have now betrayed her, too. Obi-Wan was wise to hide her from me. Now his failure is complete. If you will not turn to the dark side, then perhaps she will.

data.author: Luke
data.text: Never-r-r!

data.author: Emperor
data.text: Good! Your hate has made you powerful. Now, fulfill your destiny and take your father's place at my side!

data.author: Luke
data.text: Never! I'll never turn to the dark side. You've failed, Your Highness. I am a Jedi, like my father before me.

data.author: Emperor
data.text: So be it...Jedi.

data.author: Han
data.text: Move! Move!

data.author: Ackbar
data.text: The shield is down! Commence attack on the Death Star's main reactor.

data.author: Lando
data.text: We're on our way. Red Group, Gold Group, all fighters follow me.  Told you they'd do it!

data.author: Emperor
data.text: If you will not be turned, you will be destroyed.

data.author: Emperor
data.text: Young fool...only now, at the end, do you understand.

data.author: Emperor
data.text: Your feeble skills are no match for the power of the dark side. You have paid the price for your lack of vision.

data.author: Luke
data.text: Father, please. Help me.

data.author: Emperor
data.text: Now, young Skywalker...you will die.

data.author: Wedge
data.text: I'm going in.

data.author: Lando
data.text: Here goes nothing.

data.author: Lando
data.text: Now lock onto the strongest power source. It should be the power generator.

data.author: Wedge
data.text: Form up. And stay alert. We could run out of space real fast.

data.author: Lando
data.text: Split up and head back to the surface. See if you can get a few of those TIE fighters to follow you.

data.author: Pilot
data.text: Copy, Gold Leader.

data.author: Lando
data.text: That was too close.

data.author: Ackbar
data.text: We've got to give those fighters more time. Concentrate all fire on that Super Star Destroyer.

data.author: Controller
data.text: Sir, we've lost our bridge deflector shield.

data.author: Piett
data.text: Intensify the forward batteries. I don't want anything to get through.

data.author: Piett
data.text: Intensify forward firepower!

data.author: Commander
data.text: It's too late!

data.author: Vader
data.text: Luke, help me take this mask off.

data.author: Lure
data.text: But you'll die.

data.author: Vader
data.text: Nothing can stop that now. Just for once... let me look on you with my own eyes.

data.author: Anakin
data.text: Now...go, my son. Leave me.

data.author: Luke
data.text: No. You're coming with me. I can't leave you here. I've got to save you.

data.author: Anakin
data.text: You already have, Luke. You were right about me. Tell your sister...you were right.

data.author: Luke
data.text: Father... I won't leave you.

data.author: Wedge
data.text: There it is!

data.author: Lando
data.text: All right, Wedge. Go for the power regulator on the north tower.

data.author: Wedge
data.text: Copy, Gold Leader. I'm already on my way out.

data.author: Ackbar
data.text: Move the fleet away from the Death Star.

data.author: Lando
data.text: Wedge, I don't think we're going to make it.

data.author: Wedge
data.text: You'll make it. Just follow me Gold Leader.

data.author: Lando
data.text: I promised to return his ship without a scratch...I sure hope that old pirate forgives me.

data.author: Han
data.text: Lando...

data.author: Threepio
data.text: They did it!
